Increasing may be useful if complex queries are being run, as this will reduce the need for more memory allocations during query operation. See also query_alloc_block_size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于查询解析和执行的持久缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），在连接时分配，在断开连接时释放。如果正在运行复杂的查询，则增加可能会很有用，因为这将减少查询操作期间需要更多内存分配的需求。另请参阅query_alloc_block_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in bytes of the rollback nodes in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：缓存中回滚节点的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in bytes of the uncompressed data in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：高速缓存中未压缩数据的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in bytes of the uncompressed data that could fit in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可能适合高速缓存的未压缩数据的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in bytes to increase the memory pool available to each transaction when the available pool is not large enough. See transaction_prealloc_size.
trans-unit.target: 说明：以字节为单位的大小，以在可用池不够大时增加每个事务可用的内存池。参见transaction_prealloc_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in uncompressed bytes of leaf nodes flushed to disk as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 描述：作为检查点的一部分，刷新到磁盘的叶节点的未压缩字节大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in uncompressed bytes of leaf nodes flushed to disk not as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：刷新到磁盘的叶节点的未压缩字节大小（不作为检查点的一部分）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in uncompressed bytes of non-leaf nodes flushed to disk as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：作为检查点一部分，刷新到磁盘的非叶节点的未压缩字节大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size in uncompressed bytes of non-leaf nodes flushed to disk not as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：刷新到磁盘的非叶子节点的未压缩字节大小（不作为检查点的一部分）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of buffer to use when using multi-range read with range access. See Multi Range Read optimization for more information.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将多范围读取与范围访问一起使用时要使用的缓冲区大小。有关更多信息，请参见多范围读取优化。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of cache in MB for BlockBasedTableOptions::persistent_cache for RocksDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明： RocksDB的BlockBasedTableOptions :: persistent_cache的缓存大小（以MB为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of in-memory cache that is allocated when reading binary log and relay log files.
trans-unit.target: 说明：读取二进制日志和中继日志文件时分配的内存中高速缓存的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of memory block used in MariaDB. Can usually be left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 描述： MariaDB中使用的内存块大小。通常可以保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the CONNECT work area used for memory allocation. Permits allocating a larger memory sub-allocation space when dealing with very large if sub-allocation fails. If the specified value is too big and memory allocation fails, the size of the work area remains but the variable value is not modified and should be reset.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于分配内存的CONNECT工作区的大小。如果子分配失败，则在处理非常大的空间时允许分配更大的内存子分配空间。如果指定的值太大而内存分配失败，则工作区的大小会保留，但变量值不会被修改，应将其重置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the buffer for the index blocks used by MyISAM tables and shared for all threads. See Optimizing key_buffer_size for more on selecting the best value.
trans-unit.target: 说明： MyISAM表使用并为所有线程共享的索引块的缓冲区大小。有关选择最佳值的更多信息，请参见优化key_buffer_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the metadata locks cache, used for reducing the need to create and destroy synchronization objects. It is particularly helpful on systems where this process is inefficient, such as Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 说明：元数据锁高速缓存的大小，用于减少创建和销毁同步对象的需要。对于此过程效率不高的系统（例如Windows XP）特别有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the page storage page files. These are prefixed by gcache.page. Can be set to as large as the disk can handle.
trans-unit.target: 描述：页面存储页面文件的大小。这些以 gcache.page 为前缀。可以设置为磁盘可以处理的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the receive buffer used on the network sockets between nodes, passed on to the kernel via the SO_RCVBUF socket option.
trans-unit.target: 描述：节点之间的网络套接字上使用的接收缓冲区的大小，该缓冲区通过SO_RCVBUF套接字选项传递给内核。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the session cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 描述：会话高速缓存的大小。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the sort buffers used for sorting data when an InnoDB index is created, as well as the amount by which the temporary log file is extended during online DDL operations to record concurrent writes. Before MariaDB 10.0, this was not configurable and the current default setting of 1MB was fixed. The larger the setting, the fewer merge phases are required between buffers while sorting. When a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE creates a new index, three buffers of this size are allocated, as well as pointers for the rows in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建InnoDB索引时用于对数据进行排序的排序缓冲区的大小，以及在联机DDL操作过程中扩展临时日志文件以记录并发写入的数量。在MariaDB 10.0之前，这是不可配置的，并且当前的默认设置为1MB。设置越大，排序时缓冲区之间所需的合并阶段就越少。当CREATE TABLE或ALTER TABLE创建新索引时，将分配此大小的三个缓冲区以及该缓冲区中行的指针。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of the window for counting rocksdb_compaction_sequential_deletes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于计算rocksdb_compaction_sequential_deletes的窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size of transaction fragments for streaming replication (measured in units as specified by wsrep_trx_fragment_unit)
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于流复制的事务片段的大小（以wsrep_trx_fragment_unit指定的单位度量）

trans-unit.source: Description: Size that we have to work with during combine (reading from disk) phase of external sort during fast index creation.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在快速索引创建期间，外部排序的组合（从磁盘读取）阶段中必须使用的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Size to allocate for merge sort buffers written out to disk during inplace index creation.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在就地索引创建期间为写出到磁盘的合并排序缓冲区分配的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Skip filling block cache on read requests.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在读取请求时跳过填充块缓存。

trans-unit.source: Description: Skip records when acquired from the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从远程服务器获取时跳过记录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Skip unique constraint checking for the specified tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：跳过指定表的唯一约束检查​​。

trans-unit.source: Description: Skip using bloom filter for reads.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用布隆过滤器跳过读取。

trans-unit.source: Description: Skipping holding any lock on row access. Not effective on slave.
trans-unit.target: 说明：跳过对行访问的任何锁定。对奴隶无效。

trans-unit.source: Description: Slave password reported to the master when it registers. Reported by SHOW SLAVE HOSTS if --show-slave-auth-info is set. This password has no connection with user privileges or with the replication user account password.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从属密码在注册时报告给主机。如果设置了 --show-slave-auth-info ,则由SHOW SLAVE HOSTS报告。此密码与用户特权或复制用户帐户密码无关。

trans-unit.source: Description: Slave will rotate its relay log if it exceeds this size after a write. If set to 0, the max_binlog_size setting is used instead. Before MariaDB 10.0, max_binlog_size was global only, but with the implementation of multi-source replication in MariaDB 10.0, it could be set per session as well.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果在写入后从站日志超过该大小，则从站将旋转其中继日志。如果设置为0，则使用max_binlog_size设置。之前MariaDB的10.0， max_binlog_size 是全球唯一的，但实行多源复制在MariaDB的10.0，也可能每个会话设置为好。

trans-unit.source: Description: Slave's account user name reported to the master when it registers. Reported by SHOW SLAVE HOSTS if --show-slave-auth-info is set. This username has no connection with user privileges or with the replication user account.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从站的帐户用户名在注册时报告给主站。如果设置了 --show-slave-auth-info ,则由SHOW SLAVE HOSTS报告。该用户名与用户权限或复制用户帐户没有任何关系。

trans-unit.source: Description: Source control revision id for MariaDB source code, enabling one to see exactly which version of the source was used for a build.
trans-unit.target: 说明： MariaDB源代码的源代码控制修订版ID，使您能够准确查看用于构建的源代码版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies Aria group commit mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定Aria 组提交方式。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies how MyISAM tables handles CREATE TABLE DELAY_KEY_WRITE. If set to ON, the default, any DELAY KEY WRITEs are honored. The key buffer is then flushed only when the table closes, speeding up writes. MyISAM tables should be automatically checked upon startup in this case, and --external locking should not be used, as it can lead to index corruption. If set to OFF, DELAY KEY WRITEs are ignored, while if set to ALL, all new opened tables are treated as if created with DELAY KEY WRITEs enabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定MyISAM表如何处理CREATE TABLE DELAY_KEY_WRITE。如果设置为 ON ，则默认为所有DELAY KEY WRITE。然后仅在表关闭时才刷新键缓冲区，以加快写入速度。在这种情况下，应在启动时自动检查MyISAM表，并且不应使用--external锁定，因为它可能导致索引损坏。如果将其设置为 OFF ，则将忽略DELAY KEY WRITE，而如果将其设置为 ALL ，则将所有新打开的表都视为启用了DELAY KEY WRITE来创建。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies how corrupted tables should be automatically repaired. More than one option can be specified, for example FORCE,BACKUP.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定应如何自动修复损坏的表。可以指定多个选项，例如 FORCE,BACKUP 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies how far down the buffer pool least-recently used (LRU) list the cleaning thread should look for dirty pages to flush. This process is performed once a second. In an I/O intensive-workload, can be increased if there is spare I/O capacity, or decreased if in a write-intensive workload with little spare I/O capacity.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定清理线程应在最近最少使用的缓冲池（LRU）列表中查找多大要刷新的脏页。此过程每秒执行一次。在I / O密集型工作负载中，如果有备用I / O容量，则可以增加，而在有少量备用I / O容量的写密集型工作负载中，则可以减小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies how many of the running server threads (see max_connections and max_delayed_threads) can be instrumented. Should be greater than the sum of max_connections and max_delayed_threads. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定可以检测多少个正在运行的服务器线程（请参见max_connections和max_delayed_threads）。应该大于max_connections和max_delayed_threads之和。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies how the Aria transactional log will be purged. Set to at_flush to keep a copy of the transaction logs (good as an extra backup). The logs will stay until the next FLUSH LOGS;
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定如何清除Aria事务日志。设置为 at_flush 可以保留事务日志的副本（作为额外的备份）。日志将一直保留到下一个FLUSH LOGS；

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the algorithm that InnoDB/XtraDB uses to decide which of the waiting transactions should be granted the lock once it has been released. The possible values are: FCFS (First-Come-First-Served) where locks are granted in the order they appear in the lock queue and VATS (Variance-Aware-Transaction-Scheduling) where locks are granted based on the Eldest-Transaction-First heuristic. Note that VATS should not be used with Galera. From MariaDB 10.1.30, InnoDB will refuse to start if VATS is used with Galera. From MariaDB 10.2, VATS is default, but from MariaDB 10.2.12, the value will be changed to FCFS and a warning produced when using Galera.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定InnoDB / XtraDB用于确定释放锁后应向哪个等待的事务授予锁的算法。可能的值包括： FCFS （按先来先服务），其中按出现在锁队列中的顺序授予锁，以及 VATS （差异意识事务处理调度），其中基于Eldest-Transaction-授予锁。首先启发式。请注意， VATS 不应与Galera一起使用。从MariaDB 10.1.30起，如果 VATS 与Galera一起使用，InnoDB将拒绝启动。从MariaDB 10.2开始， VATS 是默认设置，但从MariaDB 10.2.12开始，该值将更改为 FCFS ,并在使用Galera时产生警告。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the data directory
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定数据目录

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the default row format to be used for InnoDB tables. The compressed row format cannot be set as the default.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定用于InnoDB表的默认行格式。压缩的行格式不能设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the default level of compression for tables that use InnoDB page compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定使用InnoDB页面压缩的表的默认压缩级别。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the desired output type. Can be SYSLOG or FILE. For example: SET GLOBAL server_audit_output_type=file file: log records will be saved into the rotating log file. The name of the file set by server_audit_file_path variable. syslog: log records will be sent to the local syslogd daemon with the standard <syslog.h> API. The default value is 'file'.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定所需的输出类型。可以是SYSLOG或FILE。例如： SET GLOBAL server_audit_output_type=file file：日志记录将保存到循环日志文件中。由server_audit_file_path变量设置的文件名。syslog：日志记录将使用标准的<syslog.h> API发送到本地syslogd守护程序。默认值为“文件”。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of condition instruments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定条件仪器的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of file instruments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定文件工具的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of instrumented condition objects. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定已检测条件对象的最大数量。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of instrumented file objects. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定已检测文件对象的最大数量。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of instrumented mutex instances. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定已检测互斥实例的最大数量。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of instrumented rwlock objects. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定已检测的rwlock对象的最大数目。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of instrumented socket objects. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定已检测的套接字对象的最大数量。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of instrumented table objects. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定已检测表对象的最大数量。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of messages stored for display by SHOW ERRORS and SHOW WARNINGS statements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定存储的最大消息数，以供SHOW ERRORS和SHOW WARNINGS语句显示。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of mutex instruments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定互斥量工具的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of opened file objects. Should always be higher than open_files_limit.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定打开的文件对象的最大数量。应始终高于open_files_limit。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of opened table objects. 0 for disabling, -1 (the default from MariaDB 10.0.12) for automated sizing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定打开的表对象的最大数量。 0 表示禁用， -1 （默认值MariaDB 10.0.12）表示自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of rwlock instruments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定rwlock仪器的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of socket instruments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定套接字工具的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of stage instruments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定舞台乐器的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of statement instruments. Automatically calculated at server build based on the number of available statements. Should be left as either autosized or disabled, as changing to any positive value has no benefit and will most likely allocate unnecessary memory. Setting to zero disables all statement instrumentation, and no memory will be allocated for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定语句工具的最大数量。根据可用语句数在服务器构建时自动计算。应该保留为自动调整大小或禁用大小，因为更改为任何正值都没有好处，并且很可能会分配不必要的内存。设置为零将禁用所有语句检测，并且将不会为此目的分配任何内存。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum number of thread instruments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定线程工具的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the maximum space to be used for the relay logs. The IO thread will stop until the SQL thread has cleared the backlog. By default 0, or no limit.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定用于中继日志的最大空间。IO线程将停止，直到SQL线程清除了积压。默认情况下为 0 或无限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the name of the error log. If --console is specified later in the configuration (Windows only) or this option isn't specified, errors will be logged to stderr. If no name is provided, errors will still be logged to hostname.err. If a configuration file sets --log-error, one can reset it with --skip-log-error (useful to override a system wide configuration file).
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定错误日志的名称。如果稍后在配置中指定--console（仅Windows）或未指定此选项，则错误将记录到stderr。如果没有提供名称，错误仍将记录到 hostname.err 。如果配置文件设置了 --log-error ，则可以使用 --skip-log-error 将其重置（用于覆盖系统范围的配置文件）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the node's network address, in the format ip address[:port]. As of MariaDB 10.1.8, supports IPv6. The default behavior is for the node to pull the address of the first network interface on the system and the default Galera port. This autoguessing can be unreliable, particularly in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: 说明：以 ip address[:port] 格式指定节点的网络地址。从MariaDB 10.1.8开始，支持IPv6。节点的默认行为是拉取系统上第一个网络接口的地址和默认的Galera端口。这种自动猜测可能不可靠，尤其是在以下情况下：

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the number of locks held for each InnoDB transaction to be displayed in SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定要在SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出中显示的每个InnoDB事务持有的锁数。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以便于升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the number of partitions for use in adaptive searching. If set to 1, no extra partitions are created.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定用于自适应搜索的分区数。如果设置为 1 ，则不会创建额外的分区。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the number of partitions for use in adaptive searching. If set to 1, no extra partitions are created. XtraDB-only. From MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB), this is an alias for innodb_adaptive_hash_index_parts to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定用于自适应搜索的分区数。如果设置为 1 ，则不会创建额外的分区。仅XtraDB。从MariaDB 10.2.6（默认使用InnoDB代替XtraDB）开始，这是innodb_adaptive_hash_index_parts的别名，以便于升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the number of rollback segments that XtraDB/InnoDB will use within a transaction (or the number of active undo logs). By default set to the maximum, 128, it can be reduced to avoid allocating unneeded rollback segments. See the Innodb_available_undo_logs status variable for the number of undo logs available. See also innodb_undo_directory and innodb_undo_tablespaces. Replaces innodb_rollback_segments in MariaDB 10.0. The Information Schema XTRADB_RSEG Table contains information about the XtraDB rollback segments. Deprecated and ignored in MariaDB 10.5.0, as it always makes sense to use the maximum number of rollback segments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定XtraDB / InnoDB将在事务中使用的回滚段数（或活动的撤消日志数）。默认情况下设置为最大值 128 ，可以减小它以避免分配不必要的回滚段。有关可用的撤消日志数，请参见Innodb_available_undo_logs状态变量。另请参见innodb_undo_directory和innodb_undo_tablespaces。替换innodb_rollback_segments在MariaDB的10.0。该信息架构XTRADB_RSEG表包含有关XtraDB回滚段信息。MariaDB 10.5.0中已弃用和忽略，因为使用最大数量的回滚段总是有意义的。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the number of rollback segments that XtraDB/InnoDB will use within a transaction (see undo log). Deprecated and replaced by innodb_undo_logs in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定XtraDB / InnoDB将在事务中使用的回滚段数（请参阅undo log）。已在MariaDB 10.0中弃用并替换为innodb_undo_logs。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the page size in bytes for all InnoDB tablespaces. The default, 16k, is suitable for most uses.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定所有InnoDB表空间的页面大小（以字节为单位）。默认值 16k 适用于大多数用途。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the percentage cutoff for expensive compression failures during updates to a table that uses InnoDB page compression, after which free space is added to each new compressed page, dynamically adjusted up to the level set by innodb_compression_pad_pct_max. Zero disables checking of compression efficiency and adjusting padding.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定在更新使用InnoDB页面压缩的表期间昂贵的压缩失败百分比，此后将可用空间添加到每个新的压缩页面，并动态调整到innodb_compression_pad_pct_max设置的级别。零禁用压缩效率检查和调整填充。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies the type of histograms created by ANALYZE.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定ANALYZE创建的直方图的类型。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies whether the buffer pool is automatically warmed up when the server starts by loading the pages held earlier. The related innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown specifies whether pages are saved at shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定在服务器启动时是否通过加载先前保存的页面来自动预热缓冲池。相关的innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown指定在关闭时是否保存页面。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specifies whether the insert buffer can be processed before it's full. If set to 0, the standard InnoDB method is used, and the buffer is not processed until it's full. If set to 1, the default, the insert buffer can be processed before it is full. This Percona XtraDB variable has not been ported to XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定是否可以在插入缓冲区已满之前对其进行处理。如果设置为 0 ，则使用标准的InnoDB方法，并且直到缓冲区满时才对其进行处理。如果设置为 1 （默认值），则可以在插入缓冲区已满之前对其进行处理。此Percona XtraDB变量尚未移植到XtraDB 5.6。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the IP address to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定要绑定的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the listen backlog length.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定侦听积压长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the logging verbosity.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定日志记录的详细程度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the maximum socket receive buffer (in bytes). If '0' then the system default is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定最大套接字接收缓冲区（以字节为单位）。如果为“ 0”，则使用系统默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the maximum socket send buffer (in bytes). If '0' then the system default is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定最大套接字发送缓冲区（以字节为单位）。如果为“ 0”，则使用系统默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the minimum length of the request buffer. Larger values consume available memory but can make handlersocket faster for large requests.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定请求缓冲区的最小长度。较大的值会占用可用内存，但对于大型请求，可以使handlersocket更快。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the number of worker threads for reads. Recommended value = ((# CPU cores) * 2).
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定要读取的工作线程数。推荐值=（（＃CPU内核）* 2）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the number of worker threads for writes. Recommended value = 1.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定用于写入的工作线程数。推荐值= 1。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the port to bind to for reads. An empty value disables the listener.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定要绑定以进行读取的端口。空值将禁用侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the port to bind to for writes. An empty value disables the listener.
trans-unit.target: 描述：指定要绑定以进行写入的端口。空值将禁用侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify the socket timeout in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：以秒为单位指定套接字超时。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify whether to use epoll for I/O multiplexing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定是否将epoll用于I / O复用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Stack size for each thread. If set too small, limits recursion depth of stored procedures and complexity of SQL statements the server can handle in memory. Also affects limits in the crash-me test.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个线程的堆栈大小。如果设置得太小，将限制存储过程的递归深度以及服务器可以在内存中处理的SQL语句的复杂性。也影响速成测试中的限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Start without grant tables. This gives all users FULL ACCESS to all tables, which is useful in case of a lost root password. Use mysqladmin flush-privileges, mysqladmin reload or FLUSH PRIVILEGES to resume using the grant tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：开始时没有授予表。这为所有用户提供了对所有表的完全访问权限，这在丢失根密码的情况下很有用。使用mysqladmin flush-privileges，mysqladmin reload或FLUSH PRIVILEGES继续使用授予表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Statements will not be performed if they are likely to need to examine more than this number of rows, row combinations or do more disk seeks. Can prevent poorly-formatted queries from taking server resources. Changing this value to anything other the default will reset sql_big_selects to 0. If sql_big_selects is set again, max_join_size will be ignored. This limit is also ignored if the query result is sitting in the query cache. Previously named sql_max_join_size, which is still a synonym.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果语句可能需要检查的行数，行组合或执行更多的磁盘查找操作，则将不执行这些语句。可以防止格式不正确的查询占用服务器资源。将此值更改为其他任何默认值都会将sql_big_selects重置为0。如果再次设置sql_big_selects，则将忽略max_join_size。如果查询结果位于查询缓存中，则也将忽略此限制。以前名为sql_max_join_size，仍然是同义词。

trans-unit.source: Description: Static thread count of table crd.
trans-unit.target: 说明：表crd的静态线程数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Static thread count of table sts.
trans-unit.target: 说明：表sts的静态线程数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Status of the Event Scheduler. Can be set to ON or OFF, while DISABLED means it cannot be set at runtime. Setting the variable will cause a load of events if they were not loaded at startup.
trans-unit.target: 说明：事件计划程序的状态。可以设置为 ON 或 OFF ，而 DISABLED 表示不能在运行时设置。如果在启动时未加载事件，则设置变量将导致加载事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Still available as an option for setting the default character set for clients and their connections, it was deprecated and removed in MariaDB 10.2 as a server option. Use character-set-server instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仍然可以用作设置客户端及其连接的默认字符集的选项，但在MariaDB 10.2中已弃用并删除了该字符集作为服务器选项。请改用字符集服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Storage engine used with temporary tables when the spider_bka_mode system variable is set to 1. Defaults to the value of the table parameter, which is MEMORY by default.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当 spider_bka_mode 系统变量设置为 1 时，用于临时表的存储引擎。默认为table参数的值，默认情况下为MEMORY。

trans-unit.source: Description: Storage for streaming replication fragments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于流式复制片段的存储。

trans-unit.source: Description: Stores last CRD result in the system table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将最后的CRD结果存储在系统表中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Stores last STS result into system table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将最后的STS结果存储到系统表中。

trans-unit.source: Description: String containing one or more SQL statements, separated by semicolons, that will be executed by the server for each client connecting. If there's a syntax error in the one of the statements, the client will fail to connect. For this reason, the statements are not executed for users with the SUPER privilege, who can then still connect and correct the error. See also init_file.
trans-unit.target: 描述：包含一个或多个用分号分隔的SQL语句的字符串，服务器将为每个连接的客户端执行该语句，以分号分隔。如果其中一条语句中存在语法错误，则客户端将无法连接。因此，不会为具有SUPER特权的用户执行语句，然后这些用户仍可以连接并更正错误。另请参见init_file。

trans-unit.source: Description: Support large index prefix length of 3072 bytes. If off, the maximum index prefix length is 767.
trans-unit.target: 说明：支持3072字节的大索引前缀长度。如果禁用，则最大索引前缀长度为767。

trans-unit.source: Description: Sync on transaction commit. Similar to innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit. 1: sync on commit, 0,2: not sync on commit. One can check the flushing by examining the rocksdb_wal_synced and rocksdb_wal_bytes status variables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在事务提交时同步。类似于innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit。 1：在提交时同步，0,2：在提交时不同步。可以通过检查rocksdb_wal_synced和rocksdb_wal_bytes状态变量来检查刷新。

trans-unit.source: Description: Synchronize index cardinality statistics in partitioned tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：同步分区表中的索引基数统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: Synchronizes table statistics in partitioned tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：同步分区表中的表统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: Synonym for max_delayed_threads.
trans-unit.target: 说明：max_delayed_threads的同义词。

trans-unit.source: Description: Synonym for max_join_size, the preferred name.
trans-unit.target: 说明：首选名称max_join_size的同义词。

trans-unit.source: Description: TCP timeout in seconds to declare remote backend servers unresponsive when reading from a connection. Change for high latency networks.
trans-unit.target: 描述： TCP超时（以秒为单位），以声明从连接读取时远程后端服务器无响应。更改高延迟网络。

trans-unit.source: Description: TCP timeout in seconds to declare remote backend servers unresponsive when writing to a connection. Change for high latency networks.
trans-unit.target: 说明： TCP超时（以秒为单位），以声明写入连接时远程后端服务器无响应。更改高延迟网络。

trans-unit.source: Description: TLS cipher to use. Implicitly enables the socket.ssl option. Since MariaDB 10.2.18 defaults to the value of the ssl_cipher system variable.
trans-unit.target: 描述：要使用的TLS密码。隐式启用 socket.ssl 选项。由于MariaDB 10.2.18默认为 ssl_cipher 系统变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Description: TLS verification depth.
trans-unit.target: 描述： TLS验证深度。

trans-unit.source: Description: TLS verification mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明： TLS验证模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: TLS version in use.
trans-unit.target: 说明：正在使用的TLS版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: Table name containing a list of stopwords to ignore when creating an InnoDB FULLTEXT index, in the format db_name/table_name. The specified table must exist before this option is set, and must be an InnoDB table with a single column, a VARCHAR named VALUE. See also innodb_ft_enable_stopword.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建一个InnoDB时忽略包含停用词的列表表名FULLTEXT索引，在格式DB_NAME / TABLE_NAME。在设置此选项之前，指定的表必须存在，并且必须是具有单列（名为VALUE 的VARCHAR）的InnoDB表。另请参见innodb_ft_enable_stopword。

trans-unit.source: Description: Table optimization utilizes all available resources by default. This variable allows the table optimization speed to be limited in order to reduce the overall resources used. The limit places an upper bound on the number of fractal tree leaf nodes that are optimized per second. 0, the default, imposes no limit.
trans-unit.target: 说明：默认情况下，表优化会利用所有可用资源。此变量允许限制表优化速度，以减少使用的总体资源。该限制为每秒优化的分形树叶节点的数量设置了上限。默认值 0 不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Table statistics mode. Mode for table statistics. The SHOW command is used at the table level default.
trans-unit.target: 说明：表统计模式。表统计信息的模式。该SHOW命令在表级别默认情况下使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Take and hold locks on rows that are scanned but not updated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：锁定并保持对已扫描但未更新的行的锁定。

trans-unit.source: Description: Tell InnoDB to stop any writes to disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：告诉InnoDB停止对磁盘的任何写入。

trans-unit.source: Description: Tells the server that this directory can never be a database. That means two things - firstly it is ignored by the SHOW DATABASES command and INFORMATION_SCHEMA tables. And secondly, USE, CREATE DATABASE and SELECT statements will return an error if the database from the ignored list specified. Use this option several times if you need to ignore more than one directory. To make the list empty set the void value to the option as --ignore-db-dir=. If the option or configuration is specified multiple times, viewing this value will list the ignore directories separated by a period.
trans-unit.target: 说明：告诉服务器此目录永远不能是数据库。这意味着两件事-首先，SHOW DATABASES命令和INFORMATION_SCHEMA表将忽略它。其次，如果从忽略列表中指定了数据库，则USE，CREATE DATABASE和SELECT语句将返回错误。如果您需要忽略多个目录，请多次使用此选项。要使列表为空，请将void值设置为--ignore-db-dir =。如果多次指定该选项或配置，则查看此值将列出用句点分隔的忽略目录。

trans-unit.source: Description: Tells the slave to reproduce annotate_rows_events received from the master in its own binary log. This option is sensible only when used in tandem with the log_slave_updates option.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指示从属服务器在其自己的二进制日志中重现从主机接收到的annotate_rows_events。仅当与log_slave_updates选项一起使用时，此选项才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Description: Tells the slave whether to replication events that are marked with the @@skip_replication flag. See Selectively skipping replication of binlog events for more information.
trans-unit.target: 说明：告诉从服务器是否复制带有 @@skip_replication 标志的事件。有关更多信息，请参见选择性跳过binlog事件的复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: The auto increment mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：该自动增量模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: The character set for the filesystem. Used for converting file names specified as a string literal from character_set_client to character_set_filesystem before opening the file. By default set to binary, so no conversion takes place. This could be useful for statements such as LOAD_FILE() or LOAD DATA INFILE on system where multi-byte file names are use.
trans-unit.target: 描述：文件系统的字符集。用于在打开文件之前将指定为字符串文字的文件名从character_set_client转换为character_set_filesystem。默认情况下设置为 binary ，因此不进行任何转换。这对于使用多字节文件名的系统上的诸如LOAD_FILE（）或LOAD DATA INFILE之类的语句很有用。

trans-unit.source: Description: The slow query log will log every this many queries. The default is 1, or every query, while setting it to 20 would log every 20 queries, or five percent. Aims to reduce I/O usage and excessively large slow query logs. See also Slow Query Log Extended Statistics.
trans-unit.target: 说明：该慢查询日志会记录每个这么多的疑问。默认值为 1 ，或每个查询，将其设置为 20 时,将每20个查询或5％记录一次。旨在减少I / O使用率和过大的慢查询日志。另请参阅慢查询日志扩展统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: The AWS access key to access your data. See mysqld startup options for S3.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于访问数据的AWS访问密钥。请参阅S3的mysqld启动选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: The AWS bucket where your data should be stored. All MariaDB table data is stored in this bucket. See mysqld startup options for S3.
trans-unit.target: 说明：应在其中存储数据的AWS存储桶。所有MariaDB表数据都存储在此存储桶中。请参阅S3的mysqld启动选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: The AWS region where your data should be stored. See mysqld startup options for S3.
trans-unit.target: 说明：应在其中存储数据的AWS区域。请参阅S3的mysqld启动选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: The AWS secret key to access your data. See mysqld startup options for S3.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于访问数据的AWS密钥。请参阅S3的mysqld启动选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: The MariaDB server will synchronize its relay log to disk after this many writes to the log. The default until MariaDB 10.1.7 was 0, in which case the operating system handles flushing the file to disk. 1 is the safest, but slowest, choice, since the file is flushed after each write. If autocommit is enabled, there is one write per statement, otherwise there's one write per transaction. If the disk has cache backed by battery, synchronization will be fast and a more conservative number can be chosen.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在多次写入日志后，MariaDB服务器会将其中继日志同步到磁盘。直到MariaDB 10.1.7的默认值为0，在这种情况下，操作系统会处理将文件刷新到磁盘的操作。1是最安全但最慢的选择，因为每次写入后都会刷新文件。如果启用了自动提交，则每个语句写一次，否则每个事务写一次。如果磁盘具有由电池支持的缓存，则同步将很快，并且可以选择更保守的数字。

trans-unit.source: Description: The TLS cipher currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当前使用的TLS密码。

trans-unit.source: Description: The TokuDB version of the plugin included on MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 描述： MariaDB中包含的插件的TokuDB版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: The UUID assigned to the node.
trans-unit.target: 说明：分配给该节点的UUID。

trans-unit.source: Description: The absolute or relative path and filename to a dedicated tablespace for the doublewrite buffer. In heavy workloads, the doublewrite buffer can impact heavily on the server, and moving it to a different drive will reduce contention on random reads. Since the doublewrite buffer is mostly sequential writes, a traditional HDD is a better choice than SSD. This Percona XtraDB variable has not been ported to XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指向doublewrite缓冲区的专用表空间的绝对或相对路径和文件名。在繁重的工作量中，双写缓冲区可能会对服务器产生重大影响，将其移至其他驱动器上将减少随机读取的争用。由于双写缓冲区主要是顺序写入，因此传统的HDD比SSD更合适。此Percona XtraDB变量尚未移植到XtraDB 5.6。

trans-unit.source: Description: The addresses of cluster nodes to connect to when starting up, for example gcomm://192.168.0.1:1234?gmcast.listen_addr=0.0.0.0:2345. Good practice is to specify all possible cluster nodes, in the form gcomm://<node1 or ip:port>,<node2 or ip2:port>,<node3 or ip3:port>. Specifying an empty ip (gcomm://) will cause the node to start a new cluster (which should not be done in the my.cnf file, as after each restart the server will not rejoin the current cluster). The variable can be changed at runtime in some configurations, and will result in the node closing the connection to any current cluster, and connecting to the new address. If specifying a port, note that this is the Galera port, not the MariaDB port.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启动时要连接的群集节点的地址，例如 gcomm://192.168.0.1:1234?gmcast.listen_addr=0.0.0.0:2345 。优良作法是以 gcomm://<node1 or ip:port>,<node2 or ip2:port>,<node3 or ip3:port> 的形式指定所有可能的群集节点：// / <node1或ip：port>，<node2或ip2：port>，<node3或ip3：port>。指定一个空的IP（ gcomm:// ）将导致节点启动新集群（不应在my.cnf文件中完成，因为每次重新启动后，服务器将不会重新加入当前集群）。在某些配置中，可以在运行时更改该变量，这将导致节点关闭与任何当前群集的连接，并连接至新地址。如果指定端口，请注意这是Galera端口，而不是MariaDB端口。

trans-unit.source: Description: The amount of data written to the transaction log before a checkpoint is performed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在执行检查点之前写入事务日志的数据量。

trans-unit.source: Description: The amount of memory allocated to the index cache. The memory allocated here is used only for caching index pages (.xti files).
trans-unit.target: 说明：分配给索引缓存的内存量。此处分配的内存仅用于缓存索引页（.xti文件）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The binary log file. Unlike SHOW MASTER STATUS, can be queried in a transactionally consistent way, irrespective of which other transactions have been committed since the snapshot was taken. See Enhancements for START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT.
trans-unit.target: 说明：二进制日志文件。与SHOW MASTER STATUS不同，可以采用事务一致的方式查询，而不管自拍摄快照以来已提交了哪些其他事务。请参见使用一致快照开始交易的增强功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: The binary log position. Unlike SHOW MASTER STATUS, can be queried in a transactionally consistent way, irrespective of which other transactions have been committed since the snapshot was taken. See Enhancements for START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT.
trans-unit.target: 描述：二进制日志位置。与SHOW MASTER STATUS不同，可以采用事务一致的方式查询，无论自拍摄快照以来已提交了哪些其他事务。请参见使用一致快照开始交易的增强功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: The buffer that is allocated when sorting the index when doing a REPAIR or when creating indexes with CREATE INDEX or ALTER TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在执行REPAIR或使用CREATE INDEX或ALTER TABLE创建索引时对索引进行排序时分配的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Description: The checkpoint age, as shown in the LOG section of the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS output. (This is equivalent to subtracting "Last checkpoint at" from "Log sequence number".) XtraDB only
trans-unit.target: 描述：检查点寿命，如SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS输出的LOG部分中所示。（这等效于从“日志序列号”中减去“最后一个检查点在”。）仅XtraDB

trans-unit.source: Description: The commandline option sets the TCP/IP port for connecting to the slave that will be reported to the replicating master during the slave's registration. Viewing the variable will show this value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：命令行选项设置用于连接到从属服务器的TCP / IP端口，该端口将在从属服务器注册期间报告给复制主服务器。查看变量将显示该值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The current Spider version.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前的蜘蛛版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: The database path prefix.
trans-unit.target: 说明：数据库路径前缀。

trans-unit.source: Description: The default storage engine. The default storage engine must be enabled at server startup or the server won't start.
trans-unit.target: 说明：默认存储引擎。服务器启动时必须启用默认存储引擎，否则服务器将无法启动。

trans-unit.source: Description: The default block size for a table, if not specified in CREATE TABLE. Set to 4M as default. See mysqld startup options for S3.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果未在CREATE TABLE中指定，则表的默认块大小。默认设置为4M。请参阅S3的mysqld启动选项。

trans-unit.source: Description: The default engine for wrapper mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：包装器模式的默认引擎。

trans-unit.source: Description: The directory for XtraDB redo log archiving. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：XtraDB重做日志归档的目录。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以便于升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: The file that holds the buffer pool list of page numbers set by innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown and innodb_buffer_pool_dump_now.
trans-unit.target: 说明：该文件保存由innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown和innodb_buffer_pool_dump_now设置的页码缓冲池列表。

trans-unit.source: Description: The fraction of time since the last FLUSH STATUS command that replication was paused due to flow control.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自上次FLUSH STATUS命令以来，由于流控制而暂停复制的时间百分比。

trans-unit.source: Description: The full path of the binary log file names, excluding the extension. Its value is derived from the rules specified in log_bin system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：二进制日志文件名的完整路径，不包括扩展名。它的值派生自 log_bin 系统变量中指定的规则。

trans-unit.source: Description: The full path of the relay log file names, excluding the extension. Its value is derived from the relay-log variable value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：中继日志文件名的完整路径，不包括扩展名。其值是从继电器日志变量值得出的。

trans-unit.source: Description: The fulltext default parser, for example TokenBigramSplitSymbolAlphaDigit or TokenBigram (the default). See the list of options at Mroonga Overview:Parser.
trans-unit.target: 说明：全文默认解析器，例如 TokenBigramSplitSymbolAlphaDigit 或 TokenBigram （默认值）。请参阅Mroonga Overview：Parser中的选项列表。

trans-unit.source: Description: The fulltext default parser, for example TokenBigramSplitSymbolAlphaDigit or TokenBigram (the default). See the list of options at Mroonga Overview:Parser. Deprecated since Mroonga 5.04, use mroonga_default_tokenizer instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：全文默认解析器，例如 TokenBigramSplitSymbolAlphaDigit 或 TokenBigram （默认值）。请参阅Mroonga Overview：Parser中的选项列表。从Mroonga 5.04开始不推荐使用，而是使用mroonga_default_tokenizer。

trans-unit.source: Description: The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：全局值可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新。

trans-unit.source: Description: The global value determines the default time zone for sessions that connect. The session value determines the session's active time zone. When it is set to SYSTEM, the session's time zone is determined by the system_time_zone system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：全局值确定连接的会话的默认时区。会话值确定会话的活动时区。设置为 SYSTEM 时，会话的时区由 system_time_zone 系统变量确定。

trans-unit.source: Description: The grow size of the handle data (.xtd) files.
trans-unit.target: 说明：句柄数据（.xtd）文件的增长大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: The grow size of the row index (.xtr) files.
trans-unit.target: 说明：行索引（.xtr）文件的增长大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: The highest XtraDB/InnoDB file format. This is set to the value of the file format tag in the shared tablespace on startup (see innodb_file_format_check). If the server later creates a higher table format, innodb_file_format_max is set to that value. See XtraDB/InnoDB File Format for more on the file formats.
trans-unit.target: 说明：最高的XtraDB / InnoDB文件格式。启动时将其设置为共享表空间中文件格式标记的值（请参阅innodb_file_format_check）。如果服务器稍后创建更高的表格式，则将innodb_file_format_max设置为该值。有关文件格式的更多信息，请参见XtraDB / InnoDB文件格式。

trans-unit.source: Description: The host name or IP address the slave reports to the master when it registers. If left unset, the slave will not register itself. Reported by SHOW SLAVE HOSTS. Note that it is not sufficient for the master to simply read the IP of the slave from the socket once the slave connects. Due to NAT and other routing issues, that IP may not be valid for connecting to the slave from the master or other hosts.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从属服务器在注册时向主服务器报告的主机名或IP地址。如果未设置，则从站将不会自行注册。由SHOW SLAVE HOSTS报道。注意，一旦从站连接，主站仅从套接字读取从站的IP是不够的。由于NAT和其他路由问题，该IP可能无效，无法从主服务器或其他主机连接到从服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: The implied ALGORITHM for ALTER TABLE if no ALGORITHM clause is specified. The deprecated variable old_alter_table is an alias for this.
trans-unit.target: 说明：隐含的 ALGORITHM 为ALTER TABLE如果没有 ALGORITHM 指定WHERE子句。已弃用的变量old_alter_table是此变量的别名。

trans-unit.source: Description: The increment for all AUTO_INCREMENT values on the server, by default 1. Intended for use in master-to-master replication.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器上所有AUTO_INCREMENT值的增量，默认情况下为 1 。旨在用于主对主复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: The interval, in seconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received. If set to 0, the system dependent default is used.
trans-unit.target: 描述：如果未收到确认，则发送连续的保持活动数据包之间的时间间隔（以秒为单位）。如果设置为0，则使用系统相关的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The largest size for temporary tables in memory (not MEMORY tables) although if max_heap_table_size is smaller the lower limit will apply. If a table exceeds the limit, MariaDB converts it to a MyISAM or Aria table. You can see if it's necessary to increase by comparing the status variablesCreated_tmp_disk_tables and Created_tmp_tables to see how many temporary tables out of the total created needed to be converted to disk. Often complex GROUP BY queries are responsible for exceeding the limit. Defaults may be different on some systems, see for example Differences in MariaDB in Debian. From MariaDB 10.2.7, tmp_memory_table_size is an alias.
trans-unit.target: 说明：内存中临时表（不是MEMORY表）的最大大小，尽管如果max_heap_table_size较小，则将应用下限。如果表超过限制，MariaDB会将其转换为MyISAM或Aria表。您可以通过比较状态变量 Created_tmp_disk_tables 和 Created_tmp_tables 来查看是否有必要增加，以查看需要创建的总数中有多少个临时表需要转换为磁盘。通常，复杂的GROUP BY查询负责超出限制。在某些系统上，默认值可能有所不同，例如，参见Debian中MariaDB中的差异。从MariaDB 10.2.7开始，tmp_memory_table_size 是别名。

trans-unit.source: Description: The limitation for the size of the log file. After reaching the specified limit, the log file is rotated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：日志文件大小的限制。达到指定的限制后，将旋转日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: The locale that determines the language used for the date and time functions DAYNAME(), MONTHNAME() and DATE_FORMAT(). Locale names are language and region subtags, for example 'en_ZA' (English - South Africa) or 'es_US: Spanish - United States'. The default is always 'en-US' regardless of the system's locale setting. See server locale for a full list of supported locales.
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定日期和时间函数DAYNAME（），MONTHNAME（）和DATE_FORMAT（）使用的语言的语言环境。语言环境名称是语言和区域子标签，例如'en_ZA'（英语-南非）或'es_US：西班牙语-美国”。无论系统的区域设置如何，默认值始终为“ en-US”。有关支持的语言环境的完整列表，请参见服务器语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Description: The lock mode that is used when generating AUTO_INCREMENT values for InnoDB tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为InnoDB表生成 AUTO_INCREMENT 值时使用的锁定模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: The log file size limit in bytes. After reaching this size, the log file is rotated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：日志文件大小限制（以字节为单位）。达到此大小后，将旋转日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: The logging sampling rate. Setting to 10, for example, means that one in ten errors will be logged. If set to zero, logging is disabled. The default, 1, logs every error.
trans-unit.target: 说明：日志记录采样率。例如，设置为 10 意味着将记录十分之一的错误。如果设置为零，则禁用日志记录。默认值 1 记录每个错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: The lower the setting, the more quickly buffers move from the hot key cache sublist to the warm sublist.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置越低，缓冲区从热键缓存子列表移动到热子列表的速度就越快。

trans-unit.source: Description: The lowest acceptable plugin maturity. MariaDB will not load plugins less mature than the specified level.
trans-unit.target: 说明：最低可接受的插件成熟度。MariaDB不会加载未达到指定级别的插件。

trans-unit.source: Description: The lowest sequence number, or seqno, in the write-set cache (GCache).
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入集缓存（GCache）中的最低序列号或seqno。

trans-unit.source: Description: The machine type or architecture MariaDB was built on, for example i686.
trans-unit.target: 说明：机器类型或体系结构MariaDB建立在其上，例如 i686 。

trans-unit.source: Description: The max number of records to estimate the number of matched records
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于估计匹配记录数的最大记录数

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum length of the recv queue since the last FLUSH STATUS command.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自上一个FLUSH STATUS命令以来，接收队列的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum length of the send queue since the last FLUSH STATUS command.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自上一个FLUSH STATUS命令以来，发送队列的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum number of rows that can be stored in the performance schema setup_objects table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：性能模式setup_objects表中可以存储的最大行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum number of rows to store in the performance schema setup_actors table.
trans-unit.target: 说明：性能模式setup_actors表中存储的最大行数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum number of simultaneous client connections. See also Handling Too Many Connections. Note that this value affects the number of file descriptors required on the operating system. Minimum was changed from 1 to 10 to avoid possible unexpected results for the user (MDEV-18252).
trans-unit.target: 说明：并发客户端连接的最大数量。另请参阅处理太多连接。请注意，此值会影响操作系统上所需的文件描述符的数量。最小值从 1 更改为 10 ,以避免可能的意外结果给用户（MDEV-18252）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum number of threads in the thread pool. Once this limit is reached, no new threads will be created in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 说明：线程池中的最大线程数。一旦达到此限制，大多数情况下将不会创建新线程。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum percentage of reserved free space within each compressed page for tables that use InnoDB page compression. Reserved free space is used when the page's data is reorganized and might be recompressed. Only used when innodb_compression_failure_threshold_pct is not zero, and the rate of compression failures exceeds its setting.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用InnoDB页面压缩的表在每个压缩页面内保留的最大可用空间百分比。重新组织页面的数据并可能对其进行压缩时，将使用保留的可用空间。仅在innodb_compression_failure_threshold_pct不为零且压缩失败率超过其设置时使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum permitted number of failed connection attempts due to an invalid password before a user is blocked from further connections. FLUSH_PRIVILEGES will permit the user to connect again.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在阻止用户进行进一步的连接之前，由于密码无效而导致的最大失败连接尝试尝试次数。FLUSH_PRIVILEGES将允许用户再次连接。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum size for temporary log files during online DDL (data and index structure changes). The temporary log file is used for each table being altered, or index being created, to store data changes to the table while the process is underway. The table is extended by innodb_sort_buffer_size up to the limit set by this variable. If this limit is exceeded, the online DDL operation fails and all uncommitted changes are rolled back. A lower value reduces the time a table could lock at the end of the operation to apply all the log's changes, but also increases the chance of the online DDL changes failing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在线DDL（数据和索引结构更改）期间临时日志文件的最大大小。临时日志文件用于要更改的每个表或正在创建的索引，以便在过程进行时将数据更改存储到表中。该表由innodb_sort_buffer_size扩展到此变量设置的限制。如果超过此限制，则联机DDL操作将失败，并且所有未提交的更改都将回滚。较低的值会减少表在操作结束时锁定表以应用所有日志更改的时间，但也会增加联机DDL更改失败的机会。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum size in bytes of the memory available to the Rowid-merge strategy. See Non-semi-join subquery optimizations for more information.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Rowid合并策略可用的最大内存大小（以字节为单位）。有关更多信息，请参见非半联接子查询优化。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum size of a data log file. PBXT can create a maximum of 32000 data logs, which are used by all tables. So the value of this variable can be increased to increase the total amount of data that can be stored in the database.
trans-unit.target: 说明：数据日志文件的最大大小。PBXT最多可以创建32000个数据日志，所有表都使用。因此，可以增加此变量的值以增加可以存储在数据库中的数据总量。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum size of a row-based binary log event in bytes. Rows will be grouped into events smaller than this size if possible. The value has to be a multiple of 256.
trans-unit.target: 说明：基于行的二进制日志事件的最大大小（以字节为单位）。如果可能，将行分组为小于此大小的事件。该值必须是256的倍数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum size of the container of a rowid filter.
trans-unit.target: 描述： rowid过滤器的容器的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: The maximum value of the checkpoint age. If set to 0, has no effect. Removed in MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6 and replaced with InnoDB flushing method from MySQL 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：检查点寿命的最大值。如果设置为 0 ，则无效。从MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6中删除，并由MySQL 5.6中的InnoDB刷新方法代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: The minimum length of the recv queue since the last FLUSH STATUS command.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自上一个FLUSH STATUS命令以来，接收队列的最小长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: The minimum length of the send queue since the last FLUSH STATUS command.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自上一个FLUSH STATUS命令以来，发送队列的最小长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: The minimum percentage of warm blocks in key cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：键高速缓存中热块的最小百分比。

trans-unit.source: Description: The minimum percentage of warm blocks in the key cache.
trans-unit.target: 描述：密钥高速缓存中热块的最小百分比。

trans-unit.source: Description: The most recent query optimizer query cost calculation. Can not be calculated for complex queries, such as subqueries or UNION. It will be set to 0 for complex queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：最近的查询优化器查询成本计算。无法为复杂查询（例如子查询或UNION）计算得出。对于复杂查询，它将设置为0。

trans-unit.source: Description: The name (and optionally path) of the logfile containing the errors. Rotation will use a naming convention such as sql_error_log_filename.001. If no path is specified, the log file will be written to the data directory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：包含错误的日志文件的名称（以及可选的路径）。旋转将使用诸如 sql_error_log_filename.001 之类的命名约定。如果未指定路径，则日志文件将被写入数据目录。

trans-unit.source: Description: The name of the cluster. Nodes cannot connect to clusters with a different name, so needs to be identical on all nodes in the same cluster.
trans-unit.target: 描述：集群的名称。节点无法连接到名称不同的集群，因此在同一集群中的所有节点上都必须相同。

trans-unit.source: Description: The name of the logfile or the SYSLOG parameters that are in current use.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当前使用的日志文件名或SYSLOG参数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The name of the logfile. Rotation of it will be named like sql_error_log_filename.001
trans-unit.target: 描述：日志文件的名称。它的旋转将被命名为 sql_error_log_filename.001

trans-unit.source: Description: The name of the provider. The default is "Galera".
trans-unit.target: 描述：提供者的名称。默认值为“ Galera”。

trans-unit.source: Description: The node's UUID state. If it matches the value in wsrep_cluster_state_uuid, the local and cluster nodes are in sync.
trans-unit.target: 描述：节点的UUID状态。如果它与wsrep_cluster_state_uuid中的值匹配，那么本地节点和集群节点将同步。

trans-unit.source: Description: The node's index in the cluster. The index is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 描述：集群中节点的索引。索引从零开始。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of thread groups in the thread pool, which determines how many statements can execute simultaneously. The default value is the number of CPUs on the system. When setting this system variable's value at system startup, the max value is 100000. However, it is not a good idea to set it that high. When setting this system variable's value dynamically, the max value is either 128 or the value that was set at system startup--whichever value is higher.
trans-unit.target: 说明：数量的线程组中的线程池，它决定了许多语句如何能够同时执行。默认值为系统上的CPU数量。在系统启动时设置此系统变量的值时，最大值为100000。但是，将其设置得太高不是一个好主意。动态设置此系统变量的值时，最大值为128或系统启动时设置的值（以较高者为准）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of Aria log fsyncs.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Aria日志fsync的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of Aria page cache read requests that caused a block to be read from the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：导致从磁盘读取块的Aria页面缓存读取请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of blocks written to disk from the Aria page cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从Aria页面缓存写入磁盘的块数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of bytes written to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入二进制日志的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of connections on the extra_port.
trans-unit.target: 描述： extra_port 上的连接数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of dirty blocks in the Aria page cache. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Aria页面缓存中的脏块数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of entries in the certification index.
trans-unit.target: 描述：认证索引中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of file descriptors available to MariaDB. If you are getting the Too many open files error, then you should increase this limit. If set to 0, then MariaDB will calculate a limit based on the following:
trans-unit.target: 描述： MariaDB可用的文件描述符的数量。如果出现 Too many open files 错误，则应增加此限制。如果设置为0，则MariaDB将基于以下条件计算限制：

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of locally running transactions which have been registered inside the wsrep provider. This means transactions which have made operations which have caused write set population to happen. Transactions which are read only are not counted.
trans-unit.target: 描述：已在wsrep提供程序中注册的本地运行的事务数。这意味着进行了导致写入集填充的操作的事务。只读的事务不计算在内。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of log records since last logging-start that weren't properly stored because of errors of any kind. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自上次开始记录日志以来由于任何类型的错误而未正确存储的日志记录数。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of milliseconds between each stall check performed by the timer thread. The default value is 500. Stall detection is used to prevent a single client connection from monopolizing a thread group. When the timer thread detects that a thread group is stalled, it wakes up a sleeping worker thread in the thread group, if one is available. If there isn't one, then it creates a new worker thread in the thread group. This temporarily allows several client connections in the thread group to run in parallel. However, note that the timer thread will not create a new worker thread if the number of threads in the thread pool is already greater than or equal to the maximum defined by the thread_pool_max_threads variable, unless the thread group does not already have a listener thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：计时器线程执行的每个停顿检查之间的毫秒数。默认值为 500 。停顿检测用于防止单个客户端连接垄断线程组。当计时器线程检测到某个线程组已停止时，它将唤醒线程组中的一个睡眠工作线程（如果有）。如果没有，则在线程组中创建一个新的工作线程。这暂时允许线程组中的多个客户端连接并行运行。但是，请注意，如果线程池中的线程数已经大于或等于 thread_pool_max_threads 定义的最大值，则计时器线程将不会创建新的工作线程。 变量，除非线程组还没有侦听器线程。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of open connection objects inside the wsrep provider.
trans-unit.target: 描述： wsrep提供程序内打开的连接对象的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of requests to read something from the Aria page cache.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从Aria页面缓存中读取内容的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of requests to write a block to the Aria page cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将块写入Aria页面缓存的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of rotations. When rotated, the current log file is stored and the new empty one created.
trans-unit.target: 说明：转数。旋转后，将存储当前日志文件并创建新的空文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of rows modified before we calculate new statistics. If set to 0, the default, current limits are used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在我们计算新的统计信息之前已修改的行数。如果设置为 0 ，则使用默认的电流限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of seconds before an idle worker thread exits. The default value is 60. If there is currently no work to do, how long should an idle thread wait before exiting?
trans-unit.target: 说明：空闲工作线程退出之前的秒数。默认值为 60 。如果当前没有任何工作要做，那么空闲线程要等待多长时间才能退出？

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of segments in a key cache. See Segmented Key Cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：键高速缓存中的段数。请参阅分段密钥缓存。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of times a slave has skipped errors defined by slave-skip-errors.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从站跳过由slave-skip-errors定义的错误的次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of times a thread waits for an XtraDB/InnoDB mutex to be freed before the thread is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 描述：线程在挂起之前等待释放XtraDB / InnoDB互斥锁的次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of times that sorting was done through a priority queue. (The total number of times sorting was done is a sum Sort_range and Sort_scan). See filesort with small LIMIT optimization.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通过优先级队列进行排序的次数。（排序的总次数是Sort_range和Sort_scan的总和）。请参阅具有小LIMIT优化的文件排序。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of transaction log files on disk before logs that are no longer required are deleted, default value is 3. The number of transaction logs on disk may exceed this number if the logs are still being read.
trans-unit.target: 说明：删除不再需要的日志之前磁盘上的事务日志文件数，默认值为3。如果仍在读取日志，则磁盘上的事务日志数可能会超过此数目。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of unacknowledged probes to send before considering the connection dead and notifying the application layer. If set to 0, a system dependent default is used.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在考虑连接中断并通知应用程序层之前要发送的未经确认的探测数。如果设置为0，则使用系统相关的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The offset for all AUTO_INCREMENT values on the server, by default 1. Intended for use in master-to-master replication.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器上所有AUTO_INCREMENT值的偏移量，默认为 1 。旨在用于主对主复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: The optimizer assumes that the number specified here is the most key seeks required when searching with an index, regardless of the actual index cardinality. If this value is set lower than its default and maximum, indexes will tend to be preferred over table scans.
trans-unit.target: 说明：优化程序假定此处指定的数字是使用索引进行搜索时所需的最关键的查找，而与实际的索引基数无关。如果将此值设置为低于其默认值和最大值，则索引将倾向于优先于表扫描。

trans-unit.source: Description: The parameter determines how PBXT manages auto-increment values. Possible values are '0' (MySQL standard) or '1' (Previous IDs are never re-used).
trans-unit.target: 说明：该参数确定PBXT如何管理自动增量值。可能的值是“ 0 ”（MySQL标准）或“ 1 ”（以前的ID永远不会重复使用）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The password the slave thread will authenticate with when connecting to the master. If not set, an empty password is assumed. The value in master.info will take precedence if it can be read.
trans-unit.target: 描述：连接到主服务器时，从属线程将使用其进行身份验证的密码。如果未设置，则假定密码为空。如果可以读取，则master.info中的值将优先。

trans-unit.source: Description: The percentage of garbage in a data log file before it is compacted. This is a value between 1 and 99.
trans-unit.target: 说明：压缩之前，数据日志文件中垃圾的百分比。这是介于1到99之间的值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The port the master is listening on. If not set, the compiled setting of MYSQL_PORT is assumed. If you have not tinkered with configure options, this should be 3306. The value in master.info will take precedence if it can be read.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主服务器正在侦听的端口。如果未设置，则假定为MYSQL_PORT的编译设置。如果您尚未修改configure选项，则应该为3306。如果可以读取，则master.info中的值将优先。

trans-unit.source: Description: The rate of logging. SET sql_error_log_rate=300; means that one of 300 errors will be written to the log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：记录速率。 SET sql_error_log_rate=300; 表示将300个错误之一写入日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: The shutdown mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：关机模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: The size of a transaction log file (xlog-*.xt files) before "rollover", and a new log file is created.
trans-unit.target: 说明： “翻转”之前事务日志文件（xlog-*。xt文件）的大小，并创建一个新的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: The size of the VARCHAR created when converting from a TEXT type. See connect_type_conv.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从TEXT类型转换时创建的VARCHAR的大小。参见connect_type_conv。

trans-unit.source: Description: The size of the buffer used for index blocks for Aria tables. Increase this to get better index handling (for all reads and multiple writes) to as much as you can afford.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于Aria表的索引块的缓冲区的大小。增大此值可得到尽可能多的更好的索引处理（对于所有读取和多次写入）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The size of the buffer used for index blocks for S3 tables. Increase this to get better index handling (for all reads and multiple writes) to as much as you can afford.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于S3表的索引块的缓冲区的大小。增大此值可得到尽可能多的更好的索引处理（对于所有读取和多次写入）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The size of the global transaction log buffer (the engine allocates 2 buffers of this size). Data to be written to a transaction log file is first written to the transaction log buffer. Since the buffer is flushed on transaction commit, it only makes sense to use a large transaction log buffer if you have longer running transactions, or many transaction running in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 说明：全局事务日志缓冲区的大小（引擎分配2个该大小的缓冲区）。首先将要写入事务日志文件的数据写入事务日志缓冲区。由于缓冲区在事务提交时被刷新，因此只有在您运行的事务较长或并行运行的事务较多时，才使用较大的事务日志缓冲区才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Description: The start position that the node should use in the format: UUID:seq_no. The proper value to use for this position can be recovered with wsrep_recover.
trans-unit.target: 说明：节点应使用的起始位置，格式为： UUID:seq_no 。可以使用 wsrep_recover 恢复用于该位置的正确值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The starting size, in bytes, for the connection and thread buffers for each client thread. The size can grow to max_allowed_packet. This variable's session value is read-only. Can be set to the expected length of client statements if memory is a limitation.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个客户端线程的连接和线程缓冲区的起始大小（以字节为单位）。大小可以增加到max_allowed_pa​​cket。该变量的会话值是只读的。如果内存有限，可以将其设置为客户端语句的预期长度。

trans-unit.source: Description: The strategy parameter is used to tune the compression algorithm. Use the value DEFAULT_STRATEGY for normal data, FILTERED for data produced by a filter (or predictor), HUFFMAN_ONLY to force Huffman encoding only (no string match), or RLE to limit match distances to one (run-length encoding). Filtered data consists mostly of small values with a somewhat random distribution. In this case, the compression algorithm is tuned to compress them better. The effect of FILTERED is to force more Huffman coding and less string matching; it is somewhat intermediate between DEFAULT_STRATEGY and HUFFMAN_ONLY. RLE is designed to be almost as fast as HUFFMAN_ONLY, but give better compression for PNG image data. The strategy parameter only affects the compression ratio but not the correctness of the compressed output even if it is not set appropriately. FIXED prevents the use of dynamic Huffman codes, allowing for a simpler decoder for special applications.
trans-unit.target: 说明：策略参数用于调整压缩算法。将值 DEFAULT_STRATEGY 用于普通数据，将值 FILTERED 用于由过滤器（或预测变量）生成的数据，将 HUFFMAN_ONLY 强制仅用于霍夫曼编码（不匹配字符串），或将 RLE 将匹配距离限制为一个（行程编码）。过滤后的数据主要包含一些随机分布的小值。在这种情况下，调整压缩算法以更好地压缩它们。 FILTERED 的作用是强制执行更多的Huffman编码和较少的字符串匹配。它介于 DEFAULT_STRATEGY 和 HUFFMAN_ONLY 之间。 RLE 的设计速度几乎与 HUFFMAN_ONLY 一样快，但可以为PNG图像数据提供更好的压缩。即使未正确设置策略参数，策略参数也只会影响压缩率，而不会影响压缩输出的正确性。 FIXED 阻止使用动态霍夫曼码，从而为特殊应用提供了更简单的解码器。

trans-unit.source: Description: The system time zone is determined when the server starts. The system time zone is usually read from the operating system's environment. See Time Zones: System Time Zone for the various ways to change the system time zone. This variable is not the same as the time_zone system variable, which is the variable that actually controls a session's active time zone. The system time zone is used for a session when time_zone is set to the special value SYSTEM.
trans-unit.target: 说明：系统时区是服务器启动时确定的。通常从操作系统环境中读取系统时区。有关更改系统时区的各种方法，请参见时区：系统时区。此变量与 time_zone 系统变量不同，后者是实际上控制会话的活动时区的变量。当 time_zone 设置为特殊值 SYSTEM 时，系统时区用于会话。

trans-unit.source: Description: The threshold to determine whether the match method is escalated. -1 means never escalate.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定匹配方法是否升级的阈值。 -1 表示永不升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: The timeout value, in milliseconds, for semi-synchronous replication in the master. If this timeout is exceeded in waiting on a commit for acknowledgement from a slave, the master will revert to asynchronous replication.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主服务器中半同步复制的超时值（以毫秒为单位）。如果在等待从属服务器的确认提交时超过了该超时时间，则主服务器将还原为异步复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: The total time spent in a paused state measured in nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在暂停状态下花费的总时间（以纳秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The total weight of the current members in the cluster. The value is counted as a sum of of pc.weight of the nodes in the current Primary Component.
trans-unit.target: 描述：集群中当前成员的总权重。该值被计算为当前主组件中节点的pc.weight的总和。

trans-unit.source: Description: The tracing level for semi-sync replication. Four levels are defined:
trans-unit.target: 说明：半同步复制的跟踪级别。定义了四个级别：

trans-unit.source: Description: The tracing level for semi-sync replication. The levels are the same as for rpl_semi_sync_master_trace_level.
trans-unit.target: 说明：半同步复制的跟踪级别。级别与rpl_semi_sync_master_trace_level相同。

trans-unit.source: Description: The transaction isolation level. See also SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL.
trans-unit.target: 说明：事务隔离级别。另请参阅“ 设置事务隔离级别”。

trans-unit.source: Description: The transaction completion type. If set to NO_CHAIN or 0 (the default), there is no effect on commits and rollbacks. If set to CHAIN or 1, a COMMIT statement is equivalent to COMMIT AND CHAIN, while a ROLLBACK is equivalent to ROLLBACK AND CHAIN, so a new transaction starts straight away with the same isolation level as transaction that's just finished. If set to RELEASE or 2, a COMMIT statement is equivalent to COMMIT RELEASE, while a ROLLBACK is equivalent to ROLLBACK RELEASE, so the server will disconnect after the transaction completes. Note that the transaction completion type only applies to explicit commits, not implicit commits.
trans-unit.target: 说明：事务完成类型。如果设置为 NO_CHAIN 或 0 （默认值），则对提交和回滚没有影响。如果设置为 CHAIN 或 1 ，则COMMIT语句等效于COMMIT AND CHAIN，而ROLLBACK等效于ROLLBACK AND CHAIN，因此，新事务将立即以与刚刚完成的事务相同的隔离级别启动。如果设置为 RELEASE 或 2 ，则COMMIT语句等效于COMMIT RELEASE，而ROLLBACK等效于ROLLBACK RELEASE，因此服务器将在事务完成后断开连接。请注意，事务完成类型仅适用于显式提交，而不适用于隐式提交。

trans-unit.source: Description: The type of delete_all_rows.
trans-unit.target: 说明： delete_all_rows的类型。

trans-unit.source: Description: The type of internal_xa id.
trans-unit.target: 说明： internal_xa ID的类型。

trans-unit.source: Description: The type of temporary table name for bka.
trans-unit.target: 说明： bka的临时表名称的类型。

trans-unit.source: Description: The update log is deprecated since version 5.0, is replaced by the binary log and this option just turns on --log-bin instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从5.0版开始不推荐使用更新日志，而是由二进制日志代替，并且此选项仅打开 --log-bin 改为log-bin。

trans-unit.source: Description: The update log was deprecated in version 5.0 and replaced by the binary log, so this option did nothing since then. Deprecated and removed in MariaDB 5.5.
trans-unit.target: 说明：更新日志在版本5.0中已弃用，并由二进制日志代替，因此此选项此后未执行任何操作。在MariaDB 5.5中已弃用并删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: The username the slave thread will use for authentication when connecting to the master. The user must have FILE privilege. If the master user is not set, user test is assumed. The value in master.info will take precedence if it can be read.
trans-unit.target: 描述：连接到主服务器时，从属线程将用于认证的用户名。用户必须具有FILE特权。如果未设置主用户，则假定为用户测试。如果可以读取，则master.info中的值将优先。

trans-unit.source: Description: The value of this option is not used by the plugin, but it is included in the feedback data. It can be used to add any user-specified string to the report. This could be used to help to identify it. For example, a support contract number, or a computer name (if you collect reports internally by specifying your own feedback-url).
trans-unit.target: 说明：插件未使用此选项的值，但它包含在反馈数据中。它可以用于将任何用户指定的字符串添加到报告中。这可以用来帮助识别它。例如，支持合同号或计算机名（如果您通过指定自己的 feedback-url 在内部收集报告）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The vendor string.
trans-unit.target: 说明：供应商字符串。

trans-unit.source: Description: The version number of the Galera wsrep provider
trans-unit.target: 说明： Galera wsrep提供程序的版本号

trans-unit.source: Description: The version of the TLS library that is being used. Note that the version returned by this system variable does not always necessarily correspond to the exact version of the OpenSSL package installed on the system. OpenSSL shared libraries tend to contain interfaces for multiple versions at once to allow for backward compatibility. Therefore, if the OpenSSL package installed on the system is newer than the OpenSSL version that the MariaDB server binary was built with, then the MariaDB server binary might use one of the interfaces for an older version.
trans-unit.target: 说明：正在使用的TLS库的版本。请注意，此系统变量返回的版本不一定总是与系统上安装的OpenSSL软件包的确切版本相对应。OpenSSL共享库倾向于一次包含多个版本的接口，以实现向后兼容。因此，如果系统上安装的OpenSSL软件包比用于构建MariaDB服务器二进制文件的OpenSSL版本新，则MariaDB服务器二进制文件可能会使用旧版本的接口之一。

trans-unit.source: Description: The version of the client/server protocol used by the MariaDB server.
trans-unit.target: 描述： MariaDB服务器使用的客户端/服务器协议的版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: The write lock timeout in seconds. When acting on write requests, handlersocket locks an advisory lock named 'handlersocket_wr' and this option sets the timeout for it.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写锁定超时（以秒为单位）。当对写请求进行操作时，handlersocket会锁定一个名为'handlersocket_wr'的咨询锁，此选项将为其设置超时。

trans-unit.source: Description: The wsrep protocol version being used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：正在使用的wsrep协议版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: This characterizes the number of hits a hot block has to be untouched until it is considered aged enough to be downgraded to a warm block. This specifies the percentage ratio of that number of hits to the total number of blocks in the page cache.
trans-unit.target: Description（说明）：这表征了热块必须被触摸的命中数，直到被认为足够老而可以降级为热块为止。这指定了命中数与页面缓存中块总数的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Description: This defines the global password expiration policy. 0 means automatic password expiration is disabled. If the value is a positive integer N, the passwords must be changed every N days. This behavior can be overridden using the password expiration options in ALTER USER.
trans-unit.target: 说明：这定义了全局密码到期策略。0表示禁用自动密码过期。如果值为正整数N，则必须每N天更改一次密码。可以使用ALTER USER中的密码到期选项来覆盖此行为。

trans-unit.source: Description: This is the 'write-only' variable. Assigning TRUE to this variable forces the log rotation.
trans-unit.target: 说明：这是“只写”变量。为该变量分配TRUE将强制日志旋转。

trans-unit.source: Description: This is the address from which the node listens for client connections. If an address is not specified or it's set to AUTO (default), mysqld uses either --bind-address or --wsrep-node-address, or tries to get one from the list of available network interfaces, in the same order.
trans-unit.target: 说明：这是节点用来侦听客户端连接的地址。如果未指定地址或将其设置为 AUTO （默认），则mysqld使用--bind-address或--wsrep-node-address，或尝试以相同顺序从可用网络接口列表中获取一个地址。

trans-unit.source: Description: This is the address where other nodes (donor) in the cluster connect to in order to send the state-transfer updates. If an address is not specified or its set to AUTO (default), mysqld uses --wsrep_node_address's value as the receiving address. However, if --wsrep_node_address is not set, it uses address from either --bind-address or tries to get one from the list of available network interfaces, in the same order. Note: setting it to localhost will make it impossible for nodes running on other hosts to reach this node. See Introduction to State Snapshot Transfers (SSTs) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 说明：这是集群中其他节点（供体）连接到的地址，用于发送状态转移更新。如果未指定地址或将其设置为 AUTO （默认），则mysqld使用--wsrep_node_address的值作为接收地址。但是，如果未设置--wsrep_node_address，则它将使用--bind-address中的地址，或尝试以相同顺序从可用网络接口列表中获取一个地址。注意：将其设置为 localhost 将使在其他主机上运行的节点无法到达该节点。有关更多信息，请参见状态快照传输（SST）简介。

trans-unit.source: Description: This is the amount of memory allocated to the record cache used to cache table data. This memory is used to cache changes to the handle data (.xtd) and row index (.xtr) files.
trans-unit.target: 说明：这是分配给用于缓存表数据的记录缓存的内存量。此内存用于缓存对句柄数据（.xtd）和行索引（.xtr）文件的更改。

trans-unit.source: Description: This is the size of the buffer used when writing a data log. The engine allocates one buffer per thread, but only if the thread is required to write a data log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：这是写入数据日志时使用的缓冲区大小。引擎为每个线程分配一个缓冲区，但仅在要求该线程写入数据日志时才使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: This option allows you to configure a replication master to not write statements and transactions affecting databases that match a specified name into its binary log. Since the filtered statements or transactions will not be present in the binary log, its replication slaves will not be able to replicate them.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此选项允许您配置复制主数据库，以不将影响与指定名称匹配的数据库的语句和事务写入其二进制日志。由于过滤的语句或事务将不会出现在二进制日志中，因此其复制从属将无法复制它们。

trans-unit.source: Description: This option allows you to configure a replication master to write statements and transactions affecting databases that match a specified name into its binary log. Since the filtered statements or transactions will not be present in the binary log, its replication slaves will not be able to replicate them.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此选项允许您配置复制主数据库，以将影响与指定名称匹配的数据库的语句和事务写入其二进制日志中。由于过滤后的语句或事务将不会出现在二进制日志中，因此其复制从属将无法复制它们。

trans-unit.source: Description: This option allows you to configure a replication slave to rewrite database names. It uses the format master_database->slave_database. If a slave encounters a binary log event in which the default database (i.e. the one selected by the USE statement) is master_database, then the slave will apply the event in slave_database instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此选项允许您配置复制从属以重写数据库名称。它使用格式 master_database->slave_database 。如果从属服务器遇到二进制日志事件，其中默认数据库（即 USE 语句选择的数据库）是 master_database ，则该从属服务器将改为在 slave_database 中应用该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: This option can be used to configure the server to load specific plugins. This option uses the following format:
trans-unit.target: 说明：此选项可用于配置服务器以加载特定的插件。此选项使用以下格式：

trans-unit.source: Description: This option can be used to set the server's language for error messages. This option can be specified either as a language name or as the path to the directory storing the language's error message file. See Server Locales for a list of supported locales and their associated languages.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此选项可用于设置错误消息的服务器语言。该选项可以指定为语言名称，也可以指定为存储该语言错误消息文件的目录的路径。有关受支持的语言环境及其关联语言的列表，请参见服务器语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Description: This option causes CREATE TABLE to create all TIMESTAMP columns as NULL with the DEFAULT NULL attribute, Without this option, TIMESTAMP columns are NOT NULL and have implicit DEFAULT clauses. The old behavior is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此选项使CREATE TABLE使用DEFAULT NULL属性将所有TIMESTAMP列创建为NULL。如果没有此选项，则TIMESTAMP列将不是NOT NULL并具有隐式DEFAULT子句。不建议使用旧的行为。

trans-unit.source: Description: This option tells the master to write annotate_rows_events to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此选项告诉主服务器将annotate_rows_events写入二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: This status variable provides figures for the replication latency on group communication. It measures latency from the time point when a message is sent out to the time point when a message is received. As replication is a group operation, this essentially gives you the slowest ACK and longest RTT in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此状态变量提供组通信中复制延迟的数字。它测量从发送消息的时间点到接收到消息的时间点之间的延迟。由于复制是组操作，因此从本质上讲，这为您提供了群集中最慢的ACK和最长的RTT。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable accepts a comma-separated list of TLS protocol versions. A TLS protocol version will only be enabled if it is present in this list. All other TLS protocol versions will not be permitted.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量接受以逗号分隔的TLS协议版本列表。如果此列表中存在TLS协议版本，则将启用该协议。不允许使用所有其他TLS协议版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable affects how the number of pages to sample for transient statistics is determined. In MariaDB 5.5, this system variable affects how the innodb_stats_sample_pages system variable is used. In MariaDB 10.0 and later, this system variable affects how the innodb_stats_transient_sample_pages is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量影响如何确定要为瞬时统计信息采样的页面数。在MariaDB 5.5中，此系统变量会影响 innodb_stats_sample_pages 系统变量的使用方式。在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，此系统变量影响 innodb_stats_transient_sample_pages 的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable allows you to configure a replication slave to apply statements and transactions affecting databases that match a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量允许您配置复制从属服务器以应用影响与指定名称匹配的数据库的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable allows you to configure a replication slave to apply statements and transactions that affect tables that match a specified name. The table name is specified in the format: dbname.tablename.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量允许您配置复制从属设备，以应用影响与指定名称匹配的表的语句和事务。表名称以 dbname.tablename 格式指定。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable allows you to configure a replication slave to apply statements and transactions that affect tables that match a specified wildcard pattern. The wildcard pattern uses the same semantics as the LIKE operator.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量允许您配置复制从属设备以应用影响与指定通配符模式匹配的表的语句和事务。通配符模式使用与 LIKE 运算符相同的语义。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable allows you to configure a replication slave to ignore statements and transactions affecting databases that match a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量允许您配置复制从属服务器，以忽略影响与指定名称匹配的数据库的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable allows you to configure a replication slave to ignore statements and transactions that affect tables that match a specified name. The table name is specified in the format: dbname.tablename.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量允许您配置复制从属服务器以忽略影响与指定名称匹配的表的语句和事务。表名称以 dbname.tablename 格式指定。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable allows you to configure a replication slave to ignore statements and transactions that affect tables that match a specified wildcard pattern. The wildcard pattern uses the same semantics as the LIKE operator.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量允许您配置复制从属服务器，以忽略影响与指定通配符模式匹配的表的语句和事务。通配符模式使用与 LIKE 运算符相同的语义。
