trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable can be specified as a locale name. The language of the associated locale will be used for error messages. See Server Locales for a list of supported locales and their associated languages.
trans-unit.target: 说明：可以将此系统变量指定为语言环境名称。相关语言环境的语言将用于错误消息。有关受支持的语言环境及其关联语言的列表，请参见服务器语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable can be specified either as the path to the directory storing the server's error message files or as the path to the directory storing the specific language's error message file. See Server Locales for a list of available locales and their related languages.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量可以指定为存储服务器错误消息文件的目录的路径，也可以指定为存储特定语言的错误消息文件的目录的路径。有关可用语言环境及其相关语言的列表，请参见服务器语言环境。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable can be used to determine whether the server supports symbolic links.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量可用于确定服务器是否支持符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable defines the GTID domain ID that is used for wsrep GTID mode.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量定义用于wsrep GTID模式的GTID域ID 。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable is used to configure parallel replication.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量用于配置并行复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable is used to determine the encryption password that is used to decrypt the key file defined by file_key_management_filename.
trans-unit.target: 说明：该系统变量用于确定用于解密由 file_key_management_filename 定义的密钥文件的加密密码。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable is used to determine the path to the file that contains the encryption keys. If file_key_management_filekey is set, then this file can be encrypted with Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode of Advanced Encryption Standard (AES).
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量用于确定包含加密密钥的文件的路径。如果设置了 file_key_management_filekey ，则可以使用高级加密标准（AES）的密码块链接（CBC）模式对该文件进行加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable is used to determine which algorithm the plugin will use to encrypt data.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量用于确定插件将使用哪种算法来加密数据。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable is used with MariaDB replication to identify unique master and slave servers in a topology. This system variable is also used with the binary log to determine which server a specific transaction originated on.
trans-unit.target: 描述：此系统变量与MariaDB复制一起使用，以标识拓扑中的唯一主服务器和从服务器。该系统变量也与二进制日志一起使用，以确定特定事务源自哪个服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: This system variable specifies the maximum number of table cache instances. MariaDB Server initially creates just a single instance. However, whenever it detects contention on the existing instances, it will automatically create a new instance. When the number of instances has been increased due to contention, it does not decrease again. The default value of this system variable is 8, which is expected to handle up to 100 CPU cores. If your system is larger than this, then you may benefit from increasing the value of this system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此系统变量指定表高速缓存实例的最大数量。 MariaDB Server最初仅创建一个实例。但是，只要它检测到现有实例上的争用，它将自动创建一个新实例。当实例数由于争用而增加时，它不会再次减少。该系统变量的默认值为 8 ，预期可处理多达100个CPU内核。如果您的系统大于此值，则可以从增加此系统变量的值中受益。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable controls whether or not to load the InnoDB storage engine. Possible values are ON, OFF, FORCE or FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT (from MariaDB 5.5). If set to OFF (the same as --skip-innodb), since InnoDB is the default storage engine, the server will not start unless another storage engine has been chosen with --default-storage-engine. FORCE means that the storage engine must be successfully loaded, or else the server won't start. FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT enables the plugin, but if plugin cannot initialize, the server will not start. In addition, the plugin cannot be uninstalled while the server is running.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此变量控制是否加载InnoDB存储引擎。可能的值为 ON ， OFF ， FORCE 或 FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT （来自MariaDB 5.5）。如果设置为 OFF （与--skip-innodb相同），由于InnoDB是默认存储引擎，因此除非使用--default-storage-engine选择了另一个存储引擎，否则服务器将不会启动。 FORCE 表示必须成功加载存储引擎，否则服务器将无法启动。 FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT 启用插件，但是如果插件无法初始化，则服务器将无法启动。此外，在服务器运行时无法卸载插件。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable determines if XA (2-phase commit) support is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：该变量确定是否启用XA（两阶段提交）支持。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable determines what happens to a transaction log when it is offline. A log is offline if PBXT is no longer reading or writing to the log. There are 3 possibilities:
trans-unit.target: 说明：此变量确定脱机时事务日志的处理方式。如果PBXT不再读取或写入日志，则该日志处于脱机状态。有3种可能性：

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable doesn't have any distinctive meaning for a user. Its value mostly reflects the server version with which the plugin was started and is intended to be used by developers for testing.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此变量对用户没有任何特殊含义。其值主要反映了启动插件所使用的服务器版本，供开发人员用于测试。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable is used to decide which replication domain new GTIDs are logged in for a master server. See Use with multi-source replication and other multi-master setups for details. This variable can also be set on the session level by a user with the SUPER privilege. This is used by mysqlbinlog to preserve the domain ID of GTID events.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此变量用于确定主服务器要登录哪个复制域的新GTID。有关详细信息，请参见与多源复制和其他多主设置一起使用。具有SUPER特权的用户也可以在会话级别上设置此变量。mysqlbinlog使用它来保存GTID事件的域ID。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable shows whether the server is linked with OpenSSL rather than MariaDB's bundled TLS library, which might be wolfSSL or yaSSL.
trans-unit.target: 描述：此变量显示服务器是否与OpenSSL链接，而不是与MariaDB捆绑的TLS库链接，后者可能是wolfSSL或yaSSL。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable shows whether the server supports using TLS to secure connections.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此变量显示服务器是否支持使用TLS来保护连接。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable specifies the durability of recently committed transactions. By reducing the durability, the speed of write operations can be increased.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此变量指定最近提交的事务的持久性。通过降低耐用性，可以提高写入操作的速度。

trans-unit.source: Description: This variable was removed in MariaDB 5.5, and has been replaced by the more flexible SHOW DATABASES privilege.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此变量在MariaDB 5.5中已删除，并已由更灵活的SHOW DATABASES特权代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in microseconds of long waits (more than one second) for lock escalation to free up memory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：长时间等待（超过一秒）以等待锁升级以释放内存的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in microseconds spent waiting for cache pressure to ease.
trans-unit.target: 说明：等待缓存压力减轻所花费的时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in microseconds spent waiting for more than one second for cache pressure to ease.
trans-unit.target: 说明：等待一秒钟以上以缓解缓存压力所花费的时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in microseconds that XtraDB/InnoDB threads sleep before joining the queue. Setting to 0 disables sleep.
trans-unit.target: 说明： XtraDB / InnoDB线程在加入队列之前休眠的时间（以微秒为单位）。设置为 0 将禁用睡眠。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in microseconds that a client thread spent waiting for lock escalation.
trans-unit.target: 说明：客户端线程等待锁升级所花费的时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in microseconds that the writer had to wait for the compaction or flush to complete.
trans-unit.target: 说明：编写器必须等待压缩或刷新完成的时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in milliseconds an inserted block must stay in the old sublist after its first access before it can be moved to the new sublist. '0' means "no delay". Setting a non-zero value can help prevent full table scans clogging the buffer pool. See also innodb_old_blocks_pct.
trans-unit.target: 说明：以毫秒为单位的时间，在第一次访问后，插入的块必须保留在旧子列表中，然后才能移动到新的子列表中。“ 0”表示“无延迟”。设置非零值可以帮助防止全表扫描阻塞缓冲池。另请参见innodb_old_blocks_pct。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in milliseconds before a dequeued low-priority statement is moved to the high-priority queue.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将出队的低优先级语句移到高优先级队列之前的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in milliseconds for the slave server to delay the replication thread if innodb_thread_concurrency is reached.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果达到innodb_thread_concurrency，则从属服务器延迟复制线程的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in milliseconds that a transaction will wait for a lock held by another transaction to be released before timing out with a lock wait timeout error (-30994). Setting to 0 disables lock waits.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在等待 lock wait timeout 错误（-30994）超时之前，事务将等待另一个事务持有的锁定释放的时间（以毫秒为单位）。设置为 0 将禁用锁定等待。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds before killing an idle XtraDB transaction. If set to 0 (the default), the feature is disabled. Used to prevent accidental user locks. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：终止空闲的XtraDB事务之前的时间（以秒为单位）。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则该功能被禁用。用于防止意外的用户锁定。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds before retrying if the plugin failed to send the data for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果插件由于任何原因未能发送数据，则重试之前的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds between auto-commits for idle connections using the InnoDB memcached interface (not implemented in MariaDB).
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用InnoDB memcached接口（在MariaDB中未实现）自动提交空闲连接之间的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds between automatic buffer pool dumps. If set to a non-zero value, XtraDB will also perform an automatic restore of the buffer pool at startup. If set to 0, automatic dumps are not performed, nor automatic restores on startup. Replaced by innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自动缓冲池转储之间的时间（以秒为单位）。如果设置为非零值，则XtraDB还将在启动时自动执行缓冲池的还原。如果设置为 0 ，则不执行自动转储，也不会在启动时自动还原。在MariaDB 10.0中由innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup代替。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds between sending progress reports to the client for time-consuming statements. If set to 0, progress reporting will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将进度报告发送到客户端以获取耗时的语句之间的时间（以秒为单位）。如果设置为 0 ，则将禁用进度报告。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds between the beginning of each checkpoint. It is recommended to leave this at the default setting of 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 说明：每个检查点开始之间的时间（以秒为单位）。建议将此设置保留为默认设置1分钟。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds between the end of a group of cleaner operations and the beginning of the next. The TokuDB cleaner thread runs in the background, optimizing indexes and performing work not needing to be done by the client thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从一组清理器操作结束到下一个清理操作开始之间的时间（以秒为单位）。TokuDB清理程序线程在后台运行，优化索引并执行客户端线程不需要执行的工作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds between the end of one automatic checkpoint and the beginning of the next.
trans-unit.target: 说明：一个自动检查点结束与下一个自动检查点开始之间的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds for the slave to wait for more data from the master before considering the connection broken, after which it will abort the read and attempt to reconnect. The retry interval is determined by the MASTER_CONNECT_RETRY open for the CHANGE MASTER statement, while the maximum number of reconnection attempts is set by the master-retry-count option. The first reconnect attempt takes place immediately.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从站在等待连接断开之前等待主站发送更多数据的时间（以秒为单位），此后它将终止读取并尝试重新连接。重试间隔由CHANGE MASTER语句打开的MASTER_CONNECT_RETRY决定，而最大重试次数由master-retry-count选项设置。第一次重新连接尝试立即发生。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds needed to complete all checkpoints.
trans-unit.target: 说明：完成所有检查点所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds needed to complete the last checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：完成最后一个检查点所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds since the last change after which the archived XtraDB redo log should be deleted. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：自上次更改以来的时间（以秒为单位），之后应删除已归档的XtraDB重做日志。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent ending single transaction optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 说明：结束单个事务优化所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on compressing leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：压缩叶节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on compressing non-leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：压缩非叶子节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on decompressing leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：解压缩叶节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on decompressing non-leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：解压缩非叶子节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on deserializing leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：反序列化叶节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on deserializing non-leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：反序列化非叶节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on serializing leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：序列化叶节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent on serializing nonleaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：序列化非叶节点所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent performing locktree escalation.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行锁定树升级所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while aggressively fetching basement nodes from disk.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从磁盘积极获取基础节点时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while aggressively fetching buffers from disk for queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：以秒为单位的时间，它在从磁盘主动获取缓冲区以进行查询时等待IO。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching basement nodes from disk for queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从磁盘中获取地下节点进行查询时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching basement nodes from disk for writes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从磁盘中获取地下节点进行写入时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching buffers from disk for queries by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 描述：等待IO的时间（以秒为单位），同时从磁盘中获取缓冲区以供预取线程查询。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching buffers from disk for queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从磁盘中获取查询缓冲区时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching buffers from disk for writes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从磁盘获取缓冲区进行写操作时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching off the disk by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在通过预取线程取回磁盘时，等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching pivot nodes by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在通过预取线程获取枢纽节点时，等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching pivot nodes for queries.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在获取枢纽节点进行查询时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while fetching pivot nodes for writes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在获取枢纽节点进行写入时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while writing leaf nodes flushed to disk as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在将作为刷新检查点的一部分的叶子节点写入磁盘时，等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while writing leaf nodes flushed to disk not as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将叶子节点写入磁盘而不是作为检查点的一部分时，等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while writing logs to disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将日志写入磁盘时等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while writing non-leaf nodes flushed to disk as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在将非叶节点作为检查点的一部分写入磁盘时，等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds spent waiting for IO while writing non-leaf nodes flushed to disk not as part of a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在将非叶节点写入磁盘而不是作为检查点的一部分时，等待IO所花费的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that ANALYZE operations spend on each index when calculating cardinality. Accurate cardinality helps in particular with the performance of complex queries. If no analyzes are run, cardinality will be 1 for primary indexes, and unknown (NULL) for other types of indexes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：计算基数时，ANALYZE操作在每个索引上花费的时间（以秒为单位）。准确的基数尤其有助于复杂查询的性能。如果不运行任何分析，则主索引的基数将为1，其他类型的索引的基数将为未知（NULL）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that a heartbeat packet is requested from the master by a slave.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从设备从主机请求心跳数据包的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that an InnoDB transaction waits for an InnoDB row lock (not table lock) before giving up with the error ERROR 1205 (HY000): Lock wait timeout exceeded; try restarting transaction. When this occurs, the statement (not transaction) is rolled back. The whole transaction can be rolled back if the innodb_rollback_on_timeout option is used. Increase this for data warehousing applications or where other long-running operations are common, or decrease for OLTP and other highly interactive applications. This setting does not apply to deadlocks, which InnoDB detects immediately, rolling back a deadlocked transaction. 0 (from MariaDB 10.3.0) means no wait. See WAIT and NOWAIT.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在放弃错误 ERROR 1205 (HY000): Lock wait timeout exceeded; try restarting transaction 之前，InnoDB事务等待InnoDB行锁（不是表锁）的时间（以秒为单位）：超出了锁等待超时；尝试重新启动事务。发生这种情况时，该语句（不是事务）将回滚。如果使用innodb_rollback_on_timeout选项，则可以回滚整个事务。对于数据仓库应用程序或其他长期运行很常见的应用程序，请增加此数目；对于OLTP和其他高度交互的应用程序，请减少此数目。此设置不适用于死锁，InnoDB会立即检测到死锁，从而回滚死锁的事务。 0 （来自MariaDB 10.3.0）表示无需等待。请参阅“ 等待”和“等待”。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that the INSERT DELAYED handler will wait for INSERTs before terminating.
trans-unit.target: 说明：INSERT DELAYED处理程序将在终止之前等待INSERT的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that the server waits for a connect packet before returning a 'Bad handshake'. Increasing may help if clients regularly encounter 'Lost connection to MySQL server at 'X', system error: error_number' type-errors.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器等待连接包之前返回“错误握手”的时间（以秒为单位）。如果客户端经常遇到“到X的MySQL服务器丢失连接，系统错误：error_number”类型错误，则增加可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that the server waits for a connection to become active before closing it. The session value is initialized when a thread starts up from either the global value, if the connection is non-interactive, or from the interactive_timeout value, if the connection is interactive.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器在关闭连接之前等待连接变为活动状态的时间（秒）。当线程从全局值（如果连接是非交互式的）启动时，或者从interactive_timeout值（如果连接是交互的），则线程启动时，将初始化会话值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that the server waits for an interactive connection (one that connects with the mysql_real_connect() CLIENT_INTERACTIVE option) to become active before closing it. See also wait_timeout.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在关闭服务器之前，服务器等待交互连接（与mysql_real_connect（）CLIENT_INTERACTIVE选项连接的交互连接）变为活动状态的时间（以秒为单位）。另请参见wait_timeout。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that the server waits for idle read-only transactions before killing the connection. If set to 0, the default, connections are never killed. See also idle_transaction_timeout, idle_write_transaction_timeout and Transaction Timeouts.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在终止连接之前，服务器等待空闲的只读事务的时间（以秒为单位）。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则连接永远不会终止。另请参见idle_transaction_timeout，idle_write_transaction_timeout和事务超时。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that the server waits for idle read-write transactions before killing the connection. If set to 0, the default, connections are never killed. See also idle_transaction_timeout, idle_readonly_transaction_timeout and Transaction Timeouts. Called idle_readwrite_transaction_timeout until MariaDB 10.3.2.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在终止连接之前，服务器等待空闲的读写事务的时间（以秒为单位）。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则连接永远不会终止。另请参见idle_transaction_timeout，idle_readonly_transaction_timeout和事务超时。在MariaDB 10.3.2之前称为 idle_readwrite_transaction_timeout 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds that the server waits for idle transactions before killing the connection. If set to 0, the default, connections are never killed. See also idle_readonly_transaction_timeout, idle_write_transaction_timeout and Transaction Timeouts.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器在终止连接之前等待空闲事务的时间（以秒为单位）。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则连接永远不会终止。另请参见idle_readonly_transaction_timeout，idle_write_transaction_timeout和事务超时。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds the server will wait for a client connection to send more data before aborting the read. See also net_write_timeout and slave_net_timeout
trans-unit.target: 说明：以秒为单位的时间，服务器将在中止读取之前等待客户端连接发送更多数据。另请参见net_write_timeout和slave_net_timeout

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds to wait on writing a block to a connection before aborting the write. See also net_read_timeout and slave_net_timeout.
trans-unit.target: 说明：以秒为单位的时间，等待将块写入连接之前中止写入。另请参见net_read_timeout和slave_net_timeout。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in seconds. If a thread takes longer than this to launch, the slow_launch_threadsserver status variable is incremented.
trans-unit.target: 说明：时间以秒为单位。如果线程花费的时间比启动时间长，则 slow_launch_threads 服务器状态变量将增加。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time in usecs to cache memtable estimates.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用缓存中的内存估计时间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time interval in seconds of index cardinality statistics. Set to 0 to always get the latest information from remote servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：索引基数统计信息的时间间隔（以秒为单位）。设置为 0 总是从远程服务器获取最新信息。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time interval of table statistics from the remote backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：来自远程后端服务器的表统计信息的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time limit that a node can be inactive before being pronounced as dead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：节点在宣布为死亡之前可以处于非活动状态的时间限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time period for how often retransmission of EVS join messages when forming cluster membership should occur.
trans-unit.target: 描述：形成集群成员资格时应多久重新传输一次EVS连接消息的时间段。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time that response times can be delayed before this node adds an entry to the delayed list. See evs.auto_evict.
trans-unit.target: 描述：此节点将条目添加到延迟列表之前，响应时间可以延迟的时间。请参阅evs.auto_evict。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time that the PC protocol waits for EVS termination.
trans-unit.target: 说明： PC协议等待EVS终止的时间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Time that this node requires a previously delayed node to remain responsive before being removed from the delayed list. See evs.auto_evict.
trans-unit.target: 说明：此节点需要先前延迟的节点保持响应之前从延迟列表中删除的时间。请参阅evs.auto_evict。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout for experimental I/O watchdog.
trans-unit.target: 说明：实验I / O看门狗超时。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout for the mysql connection used to kill the slave io_thread's connection on master. This timeout comes into play when stop slave is executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明： mysql连接超时，该连接用于终止主机上从io_thread的连接。执行停止从站时，此超时起作用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout in milliseconds for create HTTPS connection or execute AWS request. Specify 0 to use SDK default.
trans-unit.target: 说明：创建HTTPS连接或执行AWS请求的超时（以毫秒为单位）。指定0以使用SDK默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout in seconds for attempts to acquire metadata locks. Statements using metadata locks include FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK, LOCK TABLES, HANDLER and DML and DDL operations on tables, stored procedures and functions, and views. The timeout is separate for each attempt, of which there may be multiple in a single statement. 0 (from MariaDB 10.3.0) means no wait. See WAIT and NOWAIT.
trans-unit.target: 说明：尝试获取元数据锁的超时时间（以秒为单位）。使用元数据锁的语句包括带读取锁的FLUSH TABLES，LOCK TABLES，HANDLER以及对表的DML和DDL操作，存储过程和函数以及视图。每次尝试的超时时间都是分开的，单个语句中可能有多个超时时间。 0 （来自MariaDB 10.3.0）表示无需等待。请参阅“ 等待”和“等待”。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout in seconds to declare remote backend unresponsive when opening a connection. Change for high-latency networks.
trans-unit.target: 说明：超时（以秒为单位），用于在打开连接时声明远程后端无响应。更改高延迟网络。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout on waits for install message acknowledgments. Replaces evs.consensus_timeout.
trans-unit.target: 说明：超时等待安装消息确认。替换evs.consensus_timeout。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout period for causal reads.
trans-unit.target: 说明：因果读取的超时时间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first TCP keep-alive packet is sent. If set to 0, a system dependent default is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：超时（以毫秒为单位），直到发送第一个TCP保持活动数据包之前没有活动。如果设置为0，则使用系统相关的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Description: TokuDB algorithm to check if the table is empty when opened. Setting to disabled will reduce this overhead.
trans-unit.target: 说明： TokuDB算法，用于检查表在打开时是否为空。设置为 disabled 将减少此开销。

trans-unit.source: Description: TokuDB checkpoint on flush logs.
trans-unit.target: 说明：刷新日志上的TokuDB检查点。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total CPU time used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用的总CPU时间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total basement node bytes aggressively fetched off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从磁盘主动获取的总基础节点字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total basement node bytes fetched for queries off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从磁盘中获取的用于查询的地下节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total basement node bytes fetched for writes off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为写入磁盘而提取的总基础节点字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total basement node bytes fetched off the disk by a prefetch thread..
trans-unit.target: 说明：预取线程从磁盘取回的总基础节点字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total buffer bytes aggressively fetched for queries off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 描述：主动从磁盘取回总缓冲区字节。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total buffer bytes fetched for queries off the disk by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 说明：预取线程为磁盘查询所取的总缓冲区字节。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total buffer bytes fetched for queries off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为从磁盘查询获取的总缓冲区字节。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total buffer bytes fetched for writes off the disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为写入磁盘而提取的总缓冲区字节。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes freed when a full leaf node was evicted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当从高速缓存中逐出完整的叶子节点时释放的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes freed when a full non-leaf node was evicted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从高速缓存中逐出一个完整的非叶节点后释放的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes freed when part of a leaf node (a partition) was evicted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从高速缓存中清除叶节点（分区）的一部分时释放的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes freed when part of a non-leaf node (a partition) was evicted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当从缓存中撤出非叶子节点（分区）的一部分时释放的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes of messages injected at root for all trees.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为所有树在根处注入的消息总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes of the messages flushed from h1 nodes to leaves.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从h1节点刷新到叶子的消息的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes received from all clients.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从所有客户端收到的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes sent to all clients.
trans-unit.target: 说明：发送给所有客户端的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total bytes the logger has written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 描述：记录器已写入磁盘的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number available InnoDB undo logs. Differs from MariaDB 10.0/MySQL 5.6's innoDB_undo_logs system variable, which specifies the number of active undo logs.
trans-unit.target: 描述：可用的InnoDB 撤消日志总数。与MariaDB 10.0 / MySQL 5.6的innoDB_undo_logs系统变量不同，该系统变量指定活动撤消日志的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of InnoDB buffer pool pages.
trans-unit.target: 描述：InnoDB缓冲池页面总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of InnoDB deadlocks. Deadlocks occur when at least two transactions are waiting for the other to finish, creating a circular dependency. InnoDB usually detects these quickly, returning an error. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 描述： InnoDB死锁的总数。当至少两个事务正在等待另一个事务完成时，就会产生死锁，从而形成循环依赖。InnoDB通常会快速检测到这些错误，并返回错误。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of checkpoints failed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：检查点总数失败。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of checkpoints taken.
trans-unit.target: 说明：采取的检查点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of cluster membership changes that have taken place.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已发生的集群成员资格更改的总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of group commits done to the binary log. See Group commit for the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：完成对二进制日志的组提交总数。请参阅组提交以获取二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of group commits triggered because a binary log commit was being delayed because of a lock wait where the lock was held by a prior binary log commit. When this happens the later binary log commit is placed in the next group commit. See Group commit for the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于锁定等待而先前的二进制日志提交持有锁的情况下，二进制日志提交被延迟而触发的组提交总数。发生这种情况时，以后的二进制日志提交将放在下一个组提交中。请参阅组提交以获取二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of group commits triggered because of the number of binary log commits in the group reached the limit set by the variable binlog_commit_wait_count. See Group commit for the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于组中的二进制日志提交数达到了变量binlog_commit_wait_count设置的限制而触发的组提交总数。请参阅组提交以获取二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of group commits triggered because of the time since the first binary log commit reached the limit set by the variable binlog_commit_wait_usec. See Group commit for the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于自第一个二进制日志提交以来的时间达到变量binlog_commit_wait_usec设置的限制而触发的组提交总数。请参阅组提交以获取二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of hits for the Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：块缓存的命中总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of keys replicated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：复制的密钥总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of leaf nodes created.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建的叶节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of leaf nodes destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：已销毁的叶节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of local transactions aborted by slave transactions while being executed
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行期间从属事务中止的本地事务总数

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of local transactions committed on the node.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在节点上提交的本地事务总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of local transactions that failed the certification test.
trans-unit.target: 描述：未通过认证测试的本地事务总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of misses for the Block Cache.
trans-unit.target: 说明：块高速缓存的未命中总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of non-leaf nodes created.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建的非叶子节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of non-leaf nodes destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：已销毁的非叶节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of pivot nodes fetched by a prefetch thread.
trans-unit.target: 描述：预取线程获取的枢轴节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of pivot nodes fetched for queries.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为查询获取的枢轴节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of pivot nodes fetched for writes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取用于写入的枢轴节点总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of rows updated in all primary and secondary indexes that have been done with a separate recovery log entry per index.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在所有主索引和辅助索引中已更新的总行数，每个索引都有单独的恢复日志条目。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of time spent in MASTER_GTID_WAIT.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在MASTER_GTID_WAIT中花费的总时间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of times a single transaction optimization completed early as a result of another transaction beginning.
trans-unit.target: 描述：由于另一个事务开始而导致单个事务优化提前完成的总次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of times that a block of memory was prefetched into the database cache. This happens when it's determined that a block of memory is likely to be accessed by the application.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将一块内存预取到数据库高速缓存中的总次数。当确定应用程序可能会访问内存块时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of times the database has flushed the operating system’s file buffers to disk when the operation took more than one second.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当操作花费一秒钟以上的时间时，数据库将操作系统的文件缓冲区刷新到磁盘的总次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of times the database has flushed the operating system’s file buffers to disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：数据库将操作系统的文件缓冲区刷新到磁盘的总次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of times the master waited for an event that had binary coordinates lower than previous events waited for. Occurs if the order in which transactions start waiting for a reply is different from the order in which their binary log events were written. The global value can be flushed by FLUSH STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主节点等待事件的二进制坐标比先前事件低的总次数。如果事务开始等待回复的顺序与写入其二进制日志事件的顺序不同，则发生。可以通过 FLUSH STATUS 刷新全局值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of times the master waited for slave replies.
trans-unit.target: 描述：主服务器等待从属​​服务器答复的总次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of times the master waited for transactions.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主服务器等待事务的总次数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of transaction replays due to asymmetric lock granularity.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于不对称的锁定粒度，导致事务重播的总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of transactions committed to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：提交给二进制日志的事务总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of uncompressed bytes read from memtables, cache or table files.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从内存表，缓存或表文件中读取的未压缩字节总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of uncompressed bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入的未压缩字节总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of write slowdowns.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入速度减慢的总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of write stops.
trans-unit.target: 说明：写入停止的总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of writesets received from other nodes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从其他节点接收到的写集总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of writesets replicated to other nodes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：复制到其他节点的写集总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total number of wsrep (applier/rollbacker) threads.
trans-unit.target: 描述： wsrep（应用程序/回滚程序）线程的总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total size in bytes of all writesets received from other nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从其他节点接收到的所有写集的总大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total size in bytes of all writesets replicated to other nodes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：复制到其他节点的所有写集的总大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total size of data replicated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：复制数据的总大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total size of keys replicated.
trans-unit.target: 描述：已复制密钥的总大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total size of other bits replicated.
trans-unit.target: 说明：已复制的其他位的总大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total size of the page storage pages for caching. One page is always present if only page storage is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于缓存的页面存储页面的总大小。如果仅启用页面存储，则始终存在一页。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time in microseconds of long checkpoint begins (checkpoint begins taking more than 1 second).
trans-unit.target: 说明：长检查点开始的总时间（以微秒为单位）（检查点开始花费1秒钟以上）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time in microseconds spent by clients waiting for a lock conflict to be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 描述：客户端等待解决锁定冲突所花费的总时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time in microseconds spent waiting for disk reads (when the cache could not supply the data) to finish.
trans-unit.target: 说明：等待磁盘读取（缓存无法提供数据时）花费的总时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time in microseconds used to fsync to disk when the operation took more than one second.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当操作花费一秒钟以上时，用于同步到磁盘的总时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time in microseconds used to fsync to disk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于同步到磁盘的总时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time in milliseconds spent getting InnoDB row locks.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取InnoDB行锁所花费的总时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time spent waiting in microseconds while performing L0-L1 compactions.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行L0-L1压缩时等待的总时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time the master waited for slave replies, in microseconds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主服务器等待从属​​服务器答复的总时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total time the master waited for transactions, in microseconds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：主服务器等待事务的总时间（以微秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Total uncompressed bytes the logger has written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 描述：记录器已写入磁盘的未压缩字节总数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Track changes to the transaction attributes. OFF to disable; STATE to track just transaction state (Is there an active transaction? Does it have any data? etc.); CHARACTERISTICS to track transaction state and report all statements needed to start a transaction with the same characteristics (isolation level, read only/read write,snapshot - but not any work done / data modified within the transaction).
trans-unit.target: 说明：跟踪对事务属性的更改。关闭以禁用；仅跟踪事务状态的STATE（是否有活动的事务？它有任何数据吗？等）；特征跟踪事务状态并报告以相同特征（隔离级别，只读/读写，快照-但事务内未完成的任何工作/修改的数据）启动事务所需的所有语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Transport backend to use. Only ASIO is supported currently.
trans-unit.target: 说明：传输后端使用。当前仅支持ASIO。

trans-unit.source: Description: Ttime to wait for a primary component. See pc.wait_prim.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Ttime等待主要组件。参见pc.wait_prim。

trans-unit.source: Description: Turns on background syncs for RocksDB
trans-unit.target: 说明：打开RocksDB的后台同步

trans-unit.source: Description: Type of cardinality calculation. Only effective when the spider_crd_mode system variable is set to use SHOW (1) or to use the Information Schema (2).
trans-unit.target: 描述：基数计算的类型。仅在将 spider_crd_mode 系统变量设置为使用 SHOW （ 1 ）或使用信息模式（ 2 ）时有效。

trans-unit.source: Description: URL to key server. The expected format of the URL is <host>:<port>. The port number is optional, and the port number defaults to 14333 if it is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 说明：密钥服务器的URL。URL的预期格式为<host>：<port>。端口号是可选的，如果未指定，则端口号默认为14333。

trans-unit.source: Description: URL to which the data is sent. More than one URL, separated by spaces, can be specified. Set it to an empty string to disable data sending.
trans-unit.target: 描述：数据发送到的URL。可以指定多个URL，以空格分隔。将其设置为空字符串以禁用数据发送。

trans-unit.source: Description: UUID state of the cluster. If it matches the value in wsrep_local_state_uuid, the local and cluster nodes are in sync.
trans-unit.target: 描述：集群的UUID状态。如果它与wsrep_local_state_uuid中的值匹配，那么本地节点和集群节点将同步。

trans-unit.source: Description: Uncompressed size in bytes of the read blocks of the fractal tree leaves. Changing will only affect tables created after the new setting is in effect. Existing tables will keep the setting they were created with unless the table is dumped and reloaded. Larger values are better for large range scans and higher compressions, while smaller values are better for point and small range scans.
trans-unit.target: 说明：分形树叶的读取块的未压缩大小（以字节为单位）。更改只会影响在新设置生效后创建的表。除非转储并重新加载表，否则现有表将保留创建时使用的设置。较大的值对大范围扫描和较高的压缩效果更好，而较小的值对点和小范围扫描更好。

trans-unit.source: Description: Uncompressed size of internal fractal tree and leaf nodes. Changing will only affect tables created after the new setting is in effect. Existing tables will keep the setting they were created with unless the table is dumped and reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 描述：内部分形树和叶节点的未压缩大小。更改只会影响在新设置生效后创建的表。除非转储并重新加载表，否则现有表将保留创建时使用的设置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Unit for streaming replication transaction fragments' size:
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于流式复制事务片段大小的单位：

trans-unit.source: Description: Units of InnoDB redo log records that will trigger a purge operation. Together with innodb_purge_threads has a small effect on tuning.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将触发清除操作的InnoDB重做日志记录单位。与innodb_purge_threads一起对调优影响很小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Unneeded after XtraDB 1.0.5. If set to 0, the default, InnoDB will keep transactions between the transaction log and binary logs in the same order. Safer, but slower. If set to 1, transactions can be group-committed, but there is no guarantee of the order being kept, and a small risk of the two logs getting out of sync. In write-intensive environments, can lead to a significant improvement in performance.
trans-unit.target: 说明： XtraDB 1.0.5之后不需要。如果设置为 0 （默认值），则InnoDB将以相同的顺序保持事务日志和二进制日志之间的事务。更安全，但是更慢。如果设置为 1 ，则可以对事务进行组提交，但是不能保证保留订单，并且两个日志不同步的风险很小。在写密集型环境中，可以显着提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Unused, and removed in MariaDB/MySQL 5.5.3
trans-unit.target: 说明：未使用，已在MariaDB / MySQL 5.5.3中删除

trans-unit.source: Description: Unused.
trans-unit.target: 说明：未使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Unused. Restored as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：未使用。在MariaDB 10.2.6（使用InnoDB而不是XtraDB的默认值）中作为已弃用和忽略的选项进行了还原，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Up to what percentage of dirty pages should be flushed when innodb finds it has spare resources to do so.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当innodb发现有脏资源可以这样做时，最多应刷新脏页的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Description: Updating this variable flushes the statistics and re-reads query_response_time_range_base.
trans-unit.target: 说明：更新此变量将刷新统计信息并重新读取query_response_time_range_base。

trans-unit.source: Description: Upper limit to which InnodDB can extend innodb_io_capacity in case of emergency. Only applicable if no value was specified for innodb_io_capacity when the server started up.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在紧急情况下InnodDB可以扩展innodb_io_capacity的上限。仅当服务器启动时未为innodb_io_capacity指定值时才适用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use ANSI SQL syntax instead of MySQL syntax. This mode will also set transaction isolation levelserializable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用ANSI SQL语法而不是MySQL语法。此模式还将设置事务隔离级别可序列化。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use ClockCache instead of default LRUCache for RocksDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用ClockCache代替用于RocksDB的默认LRUCache。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use a backup-safe TRUNCATE TABLE implementation and crash-safe rename operations inside InnoDB. This is not compatible with hot backup tools other than Mariabackup. Users who need to use such tools may set this to OFF.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在InnoDB中使用备份安全的TRUNCATE TABLE实现和崩溃安全的重命名操作。这与Mariabackup以外的其他热备份工具不兼容。需要使用此类工具的用户可以将其设置为 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use bulk-load mode for inserts. This disables unique_checks and enables rocksdb_commit_in_the_middle.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对插件使用批量加载模式。这将禁用unique_checks并启用rocksdb_commit_in_the_middle。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use new functionality that will exist in next version of MariaDB. This function exists to make it easier to prepare for an upgrade. For version 5.1 this functions enables the LIST and RANGE partitions functions for ndbcluster.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用新版本的MariaDB中将存在的新功能。存在此功能可以简化升级准备。对于5.1版，此功能为ndbcluster启用LIST和RANGE分区功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use real table for temporary table list.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用真实表作为临时表列表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use system (external) locking (disabled by default). With this option enabled you can run myisamchk to test (not repair) tables while the server is running. Disable with --skip-external-locking.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用系统（外部）锁定（默认情况下禁用）。启用此选项后，您可以在服务器运行时运行myisamchk以测试（而非修复）表。使用--skip-external-locking禁用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use the mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin instead of the dialog client authentication plugin. This may be needed for compatibility reasons, but it only supports simple PAM configurations that don't require any input besides a password.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用 mysql_clear_password 客户端认证插件而不是 dialog 客户端认证插件。出于兼容性原因，可能需要这样做，但是它仅支持简单的PAM配置，除了密码外不需要任何输入。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use this many iops for background key rotation operations performed by the background encryption threads.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将这么多iops用于后台加密线程执行的后台密钥旋转操作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Use trim to free up space of compressed blocks.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用修剪释放压缩块的空间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used by mysql installation scripts, such as mysql_install_db to execute SQL scripts before any privilege or system tables exist. Do no use while an existing MariaDB instance is running.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由mysql安装脚本（例如mysql_install_db）用于在存在任何特权表或系统表之前执行SQL脚本。在现有的MariaDB实例运行时不要使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used by plugin internals. It has no useful meaning to users.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由插件内部使用。对用户没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used by the developers only, and not manually serviceable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅由开发人员使用，不能手动维护。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used for debugging. Use at your own risk.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于调试。使用风险自负。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used for getting MariaDB to emulate behavior from an old version of MySQL or MariaDB. See OLD Mode. Will be used to replace the old variable over time.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于使MariaDB模仿旧版本的MySQL或MariaDB的行为。请参阅“ 旧模式”。随着时间的推移将用于替换旧变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used in debugging to show the interface to the Debug Sync facility. MariaDB needs to be configured with -DENABLE_DEBUG_SYNC=1 for this variable to be available.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于调试以显示Debug Sync工具的接口。必须使用-DENABLE_DEBUG_SYNC = 1配置MariaDB，此变量才可用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used to decide which algorithm to choose when sorting rows. If the total size of the column data, not including columns that are part of the sort, is less than max_length_for_sort_data, then we add these to the sort key. This can speed up the sort as we don't have to re-read the same row again later. Setting the value too high can slow things down as there will be a higher disk activity for doing the sort.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于决定对行进行排序时选择哪种算法。如果列数据的总大小（不包括属于排序的列）小于 max_length_for_sort_data ，则将它们添加到排序键中。这样可以加快排序速度，因为我们以后不必再次读取同一行。将该值设置得太高会降低速度，因为执行排序的磁盘活动会更多。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used to override the result of records_in_range() when FORCE INDEX is used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当使用FORCE INDEX时，用于覆盖records_in_range（）的结果。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used to override the result of records_in_range(). Set to a positive number to override.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于覆盖records_in_range（）的结果。设置为正数以覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used to pass the DBUG options to the wsrep provider.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于将DBUG选项传递给wsrep提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used to restrict the speed at which a replication slave can read the binlog from the master. This can be used to reduce the load on a master if many slaves need to download large amounts of old binlog files at the same time. The network traffic will be restricted to the specified number of kilobytes per second.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用来限制复制从服务器从主服务器读取二进制日志的速度。如果许多从属服务器需要同时下载大量旧的binlog文件，则可以使用它来减轻主服务器的负载。网络流量将被限制为每秒指定的千字节数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used to track the effectiveness of the Prefix Index Queries Optimization (MDEV-6929)
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于跟踪前缀索引查询优化（MDEV-6929）的有效性

trans-unit.source: Description: Used with help option for detailed help.
trans-unit.target: 说明：与帮助选项一起使用可获得详细帮助。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used with Data Scrubbing in 10.1.3 only - replaced in 10.1.4 by innodb_scrub_log_speed. InnoDB redo log scrubbing interval in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅与10.1.3中的数据清理一起使用-在10.1.4中由innodb_scrub_log_speed替换。InnoDB重做日志清理间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used with Percona's SHM buffer pool patch in XtraDB 5.5. Later deprecated in XtraDB 5.5, and removed in XtraDB 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 说明：与XtraDB 5.5中的Percona的SHM缓冲池修补程序一起使用。后来在XtraDB 5.5中弃用，并在XtraDB 5.6中删除。

trans-unit.source: Description: Used with Percona's SHM buffer pool patch in XtraDB 5.5. Was shortly deprecated in XtraDB XtraDB 5.5.13-20.4, and removed in XtraDB 5.6. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 说明：与XtraDB 5.5中的Percona的SHM缓冲池修补程序一起使用。在XtraDB中不久不推荐使用XtraDB 5.5.13-20.4，并在XtraDB 5.6中将其删除。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Username and password of the user to use for replication. Unused if wsrep_sst_method is set to rsync, while for other methods it should be in the format <user>:<password>. The contents are masked in logs and when querying the value with SHOW VARIABLES. See Introduction to State Snapshot Transfers (SSTs) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于复制的用户名和密码。如果wsrep_sst_method设置为 rsync ，则不使用，而对于其他方法，它的格式应为 <user>:<password> 。当使用SHOW VARIABLES查询值时，内容在日志中被屏蔽。有关更多信息，请参见状态快照传输（SST）简介。

trans-unit.source: Description: Using this option will cause most temporary files created to use a small set of names, rather than a unique name for each new file.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用此选项将使大多数创建的临时文件使用一小组名称，而不是每个新文件使用唯一名称。

trans-unit.source: Description: Usually with InnoDB, data changed by a transaction is written to an undo space to permit read consistency, and freed when the transaction is complete. Many, or large, transactions, can cause the main tablespace to grow dramatically, reducing performance. This option, introduced in XtraDB 5.1 and removed for 5.5, allows multiple threads to perform the purging, resulting in slower, but much more stable performance.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通常对于InnoDB，由事务更改的数据被写入撤消空间以允许读取一致性，并在事务完成时释放。许多事务或大型事务可能导致主表空间急剧增长，从而降低性能。此选项在XtraDB 5.1中引入，并在5.5中删除，该选项允许多个线程执行清除，从而导致性能降低，但性能更加稳定。

trans-unit.source: Description: Usually, InnoDB has 1024 undo slots in its rollback segment, so 1024 transactions can run in parallel. New transactions will fail if all slots are used. Setting this variable to 1 expands the available undo slots to 4072. Not recommended unless you get the Warning: cannot find a free slot for an undo log error in the error log, as it makes data files unusable for ibbackup, or MariaDB servers not run with this option. See also undo log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通常，InnoDB在其回滚段中具有1024个撤消插槽，因此1024个事务可以并行运行。如果使用了所有插槽，则新事务将失败。将此变量设置为 1 会将可用的撤消插槽扩展到4072。除非您得到 Warning: cannot find a free slot for an undo log 在错误日志中找不到撤消日志错误的可用插槽，否则不建议这样做，因为这会使数据文件不可用于ibbackup，或者MariaDB服务器无法运行使用此选项。另请参见undo log。

trans-unit.source: Description: Usually, MariaDB writes changes to disk after each SQL statement, and the operating system handles synchronizing (flushing) it to disk. If set to ON, the server will synchronize all changes to disk after each statement.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通常，MariaDB在每个SQL语句之后将更改写入磁盘，然后操作系统将其同步（刷新）到磁盘。如果设置为 ON ，则服务器将在每个语句之后将所有更改同步到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Description: Usually, TokuDB permits column addition, deletion, expansion, and renaming with minimal locking, very quickly. This variable determines whether certain slow [alter|ALTER]] table statements that cannot take advantage of this feature are permitted. Statements that are slow are those that include a mix of column additions, deletions or expansions, for example, ALTER TABLE t1 ADD COLUMN c1 int, DROP COLUMN c2.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通常，TokuDB允许以最小的锁定非常快速地添加，删除，扩展和重命名列。此变量确定是否允许某些无法利用此功能的慢速[alter | ALTER]表语句。慢速语句是包含列添加，删除或扩展的混合语句，例如 ALTER TABLE t1 ADD COLUMN c1 int, DROP COLUMN c2 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Value of the COMPILATION_COMMENT option specified by CMake when building MariaDB, for example mariadb.org binary distribution.
trans-unit.target: 描述：构建MariaDB时CMake指定的COMPILATION_COMMENT选项的值，例如 mariadb.org binary distribution 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Value to be used for the next statement inserting a new AUTO_INCREMENT value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：下一个插入新的AUTO_INCREMENT值的语句要使用的值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Variable to set to reject queries from client connections, useful for maintenance. The node continues to apply write-sets, but an Error 1047: Unknown command error is generated by a client query.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为拒绝来自客户端连接的查询的变量，对维护很有用。该节点继续应用写集，但是客户端查询生成 Error 1047: Unknown command 错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: Verify binlog checksums when reading events from the binlog on the master.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从主数据库上的二进制日志读取事件时，请验证二进制日志校验和。

trans-unit.source: Description: Verify binlog checksums when the slave SQL thread reads events from the relay log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当从属SQL线程从中继日志读取事件时，请验证binlog校验和。

trans-unit.source: Description: Verify all .frm files match all RocksDB tables (0 means no verification, 1 means verify and fail on error, and 2 means verify but continue.
trans-unit.target: 说明：验证所有.frm文件是否与所有RocksDB表匹配（0表示不进行验证，1表示进行验证并失败，而2表示进行验证但继续。

trans-unit.source: Description: Verify binlog checksums when reading events from the binlog on the master.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从主数据库上的二进制日志中读取事件时，请验证二进制日志校验和。

trans-unit.source: Description: Verify binlog checksums when the slave SQL thread reads events from the relay log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当从属SQL线程从中继日志中读取事件时，请验证binlog校验和。

trans-unit.source: Description: Verify checksums when reading index/table records.
trans-unit.target: 描述：读取索引/表记录时验证校验和。

trans-unit.source: Description: Version of the used malloc library.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用的malloc库的版本。

trans-unit.source: Description: Waiting time before allowing a peer that was declared outside of the stable view to reconnect.
trans-unit.target: 描述：等待允许在稳定视图外部声明的对等方重新连接之前的等待时间。

trans-unit.source: Description: Wake up drop index thread.
trans-unit.target: 描述：唤醒下降索引线程。

trans-unit.source: Description: Weight coefficient used to calculate effectiveness of index from the cardinality of column. For more information, see the description for the spider_crd_type system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：权重系数，用于根据列的基数来计算索引的有效性。有关更多信息，请参见 spider_crd_type 系统变量的描述。

trans-unit.source: Description: What action to perform when a corrupt table is found. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 描述：发现损坏的表时要执行的操作。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: When server_audit_output_type=file', this specifies the number of rotations to save. If set to 0 then the log never rotates. The default value is 9.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当server_audit_output_type = file '时，它指定要保存的转数。如果设置为0，则日志永远不会旋转。预设值为9。

trans-unit.source: Description: When server_audit_output_type=file, it limits the size of the log file. Reaching that limit turns on the rotation - the current log file is renamed as 'file_path.1'. The empty log file is created as 'file_path' to log into it. The default value is 1000000.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当server_audit_output_type = file时，它限制了日志文件的大小。达到该限制将启动轮换-当前日志文件被重命名为“ file_path.1”。空日志文件将创建为“ file_path”以登录到该文件。默认值为1000000。

trans-unit.source: Description: When server_audit_output_type=file, sets the path and the filename to the log file. If the specified path exists as a directory, then the log will be created inside that directory with the name 'server_audit.log'. Otherwise the value is treated as a filename. The default value is 'server_audit.log', which means this file will be created in the database directory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当server_audit_output_type = file时，将路径和文件名设置为日志文件。如果指定的路径作为目录存在，则将在该目录内创建名为“ server_audit.log”的日志。否则，该值将被视为文件名。默认值为“ server_audit.log”，这意味着将在数据库目录中创建此文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: When server_audit_output_type=file, the user can force the log file rotation by setting this variable to ON or 1.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当server_audit_output_type = file时，用户可以通过将此变量设置为ON或1来强制轮换日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Description: When parallel_replication is used, the SQL thread will read ahead in the relay logs, queueing events in memory while looking for opportunities for executing events in parallel. This system variable sets a limit for how much memory it will use for this.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用parallel_replication时，SQL线程将在中继日志中预先读取，将事件排队在内存中，同时寻找并行执行事件的机会。此系统变量设置了为此使用多少内存的限制。

trans-unit.source: Description: When password validation plugins are enabled, reject passwords that cannot be validated (passwords specified as a hash). This excludes direct updates to the privilege tables.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当密码验证插件被启用，拒绝无法验证（指定为散列密码）的密码。这不包括对特权表的直接更新。

trans-unit.source: Description: When a node receives more write-sets than it can apply, the transactions are placed in a received queue. If the node's received queue has too many write-sets waiting to be applied (as defined by the gcs.fc_limit WSREP provider option), then the node would usually engage Flow Control. However, when this option is set to ON, Flow Control will be disabled for the desynced node. The desynced node works through the received queue until it reaches a more manageable size. The desynced node continues to receive write-sets from the other nodes in the cluster. The other nodes in the cluster do not wait for the desynced node to catch up, so the desynced node can fall even further behind the other nodes in the cluster. You can check if a node is desynced by checking if the wsrep_local_state_comment status variable is equal to Donor/Desynced.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当节点收到的写集超出其可应用的数量时，事务将放入接收的队列中。如果节点的接收队列中等待应用的写入集过多（如 gcs.fc_limit WSREP提供程序选项所定义），则该节点通常将使用Flow Control。但是，当此选项设置为 ON 时，将为取消同步的节点禁用流控制。取消同步的节点将一直处理接收到的队列，直到达到可管理的大小为止。已取消同步的节点继续从群集中的其他节点接收写集。群集中的其他节点不等待不同步的节点赶上，因此，不同步的节点可能甚至落在群集中的其他节点之后。您可以通过检查 wsrep_local_state_comment 状态变量是否等于 Donor/Desynced 来检查节点是否被取消同步。

trans-unit.source: Description: When a user password has expired (see User Password Expiry), this variable controls how the server handles clients that are not aware of the sandbox mode. If enabled, the client is not permitted to connect, otherwise the server puts the client in a sandbox mode.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当用户密码过期时（请参阅“ 用户密码过期”），此变量控制服务器如何处理不知道沙箱模式的客户端。如果启用，则不允许客户端连接，否则服务器会将客户端置于沙盒模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: When an error occurs during a transaction on the slave, replication usually halts. By default, transactions that caused a deadlock or elapsed lock wait timeout will be retried. One can add other errors to the the list of errors that should be retried by adding a comma-separated list of error numbers to this variable. This is particularly useful in some Spider setups. Some recommended errors to retry for Spider are 1158,1159,1160,1161,1429,2013,12701.(From MariaDB 10.4.5, these are in the default value)
trans-unit.target: 说明：在从属服务器上的事务处理过程中发生错误时，复制通常会暂停。默认情况下，将重试导致死锁或锁等待等待超时的事务。可以通过将以逗号分隔的错误编号列表添加到此变量中，来将其他错误添加到应重试的错误列表中。这在某些Spider设置中特别有用。建议对Spider重试的一些错误为1158,1159,1160,1161,1429,2013,12701。（从MariaDB 10.4.5开始，这些是默认值）

trans-unit.source: Description: When an error occurs on the slave, replication usually halts. This option permits a list of error codes to ignore, and for which replication will continue. This option should never be needed in normal use, and careless use could lead to slaves that are out of sync with masters. Error codes are in the format of the number from the slave error log. Using all as an option permits the slave the keep replicating no matter what error it encounters, an option you would never normally need in production and which could rapidly lead to data inconsistencies. A count of these is kept in slave_skipped_errors.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当从属服务器发生错误时，复制通常会停止。此选项允许忽略错误代码列表，并且将继续进行复制。正常使用中永远不需要此选项，并且粗心的使用可能导致从机与主机不同步。错误代码采用从站错误日志中编号的格式。将 all 用作选项可以使从属设备无论遇到什么错误都可以继续复制，这是生产中通常不需要的选项，它可能会迅速导致数据不一致。这些计数保留在slave_skipped_errors中。

trans-unit.source: Description: When bit zero is set (default 1), a JSON document describing the most recent lock conflict is reported to tokudb_last_lock_timeout. When set to 0, no lock conflicts are reported. When bit one is set, the JSON document is printed to the error log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：设置为零位（默认为 1 ）时，将向tokudb_last_lock_timeout报告描述最新锁冲突的JSON文档。设置为 0 时，不报告锁冲突。设置了第一位后，JSON文档将打印到错误日志中。

trans-unit.source: Description: When deleting a percentage of the tree (useful when the left side of the tree has many deletions, such as a pattern with increasing ids or dates), it's possible to optimize a subset of the fractal tree, as determined by the value of this variable, which ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 (indicating the whole tree).
trans-unit.target: 说明：删除树的某个百分比时（当树的左侧有很多删除项（例如具有增加的id或日期的模式）时很有用），可以优化分形树的子集，具体取决于此变量，范围从 0.0 到 1.0 （表示整棵树）。

trans-unit.source: Description: When enabled, undo tablespaces that are larger than innodb_max_undo_log_size are marked for truncation. See also innodb_purge_rseg_truncate_frequency.
trans-unit.target: 说明：启用后，大于innodb_max_undo_log_size的撤消表空间将被标记为被截断。另请参见innodb_purge_rseg_truncate_frequency。

trans-unit.source: Description: When purge operations are lagging on a busy server, setting innodb_max_purge_lag can help. By default set to 0, no lag, the figure is used to calculate a time lag for each INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE when the system is lagging. XtraDB/InnoDB keeps a list of transactions with delete-marked index records due to UPDATE and DELETE statements. The length of this list is purge_lag, and the calculation, performed every ten seconds, is as follows: ((purge_lag/innodb_max_purge_lag)×10)–5 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当清除操作在繁忙的服务器上滞后时，设置innodb_max_purge_lag会有所帮助。默认情况下设置为 0 （无延迟），该数字用于计算系统滞后时每个INSERT，UPDATE和DELETE的时间滞后。由于UPDATE和DELETE语句，XtraDB / InnoDB保留带有删除标记的索引记录的事务列表。该列表的长度为 purge_lag ，每十秒钟执行一次计算，如下所示：（（purge_lag / innodb_max_purge_lag）×10）–5毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to 1, the default, when a stored routine is created, the creator is automatically granted permission to ALTER (which includes dropping) and to EXECUTE the routine. If set to 0, the creator is not automatically granted these privileges.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为1（默认值）时，创建存储的例程时，将自动为创建者授予ALTER（包括删除）和EXECUTE例程的权限。如果设置为0，则不会自动为创建者授予这些特权。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to 1 (0 is default), OPTIMIZE TABLE will only process InnoDB FULLTEXT index data. Only intended for use during fulltext index maintenance.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当设置为 1 （默认为 0 ）时，OPTIMIZE TABLE将仅处理InnoDB FULLTEXT索引数据。仅用于全文索引维护期间。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to 1 (0 is default), XtraDB will preallocate pages in the buffer pool on starting up so that NUMA allocation decisions are made while the buffer cache is still clean. XtraDB only. This option was made ineffective in MariaDB 10.0.23. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为 1 （默认 0 ）时，XtraDB将在启动时在缓冲池中预分配页面，以便在缓冲区高速缓存仍然干净时做出NUMA分配决定。仅XtraDB。此选项在MariaDB 10.0.23中无效。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to 1 (0 is default), no updates are permitted except from users with the SUPER privilege or slave servers updating from a master. The read_only variable is useful for slave servers to ensure no updates are accidentally made outside of what are performed on the master. Inserting rows to log tables, updates to temporary tables and OPTIMIZE TABLE or ANALYZE TABLE statements are excluded from this limitation. From MariaDB 5.5, if read_only is set to 1, then the SET PASSWORD statement is limited only to users with the SUPER privilege. Attempting to set this variable to 1 will fail if the current session has table locks or transactions pending, while if other sessions hold table locks, the statement will wait until these locks are released before completing. While the attempt to set read_only is waiting, other requests for table locks or transactions will also wait until read_only has been set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为 1 （默认为 0 ）时，除具有 SUPER 特权的用户或从属服务器从主服务器进行更新外，不允许进行任何更新。该 read_only 变量是有用的从属服务器，以确保没有更新偶然由在主进行什么外面。此限制不包括向日志表插入行，对临时表进行更新以及 OPTIMIZE TABLE 或 ANALYZE TABLE 语句。在MariaDB 5.5中，如果 read_only 设置为 1 ，则 SET PASSWORD 语句仅限于具有 SUPER 的用户特权。如果当前会话具有表锁或挂起的事务，则尝试将此变量设置为 1 将会失败，而如果其他会话拥有表锁，则该语句将等到这些锁释放后再完成。在尝试设置 read_only 的过程中，其他对表锁或事务的请求也将等待，直到设置了 read_only 。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to 1 (the default is 0), InnoDB defragmentation is enabled. When set to FALSE, all existing defragmentation will be paused and new defragmentation commands will fail. Paused defragmentation commands will resume when this variable is set to true again. See Defragmenting InnoDB Tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为 1 （默认值为 0 ）时，将启用InnoDB碎片整理。设置为FALSE时，所有现有的碎片整理将暂停，新的碎片整理命令将失败。当此变量再次设置为true时，将继续执行暂停的碎片整理命令。请参阅对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to ON (OFF is default), debug messages will be logged to the error log as well.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为 ON （默认为 OFF ）时，调试消息也将记录到错误日志中。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to ON (the default), primary keys will be automatically generated for tables without one. This is required for parallel applying, and strongly recommended for all tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为“ ON （默认值）时，将自动为没有一个表的表生成主键。这对于并行应用是必需的，强烈建议对所有表使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to true, the default, the node will wait for a primary component for the period of time specified by pc.wait_prim_timeout. Used to bring up non-primary components and make them primary using pc.bootstrap.
trans-unit.target: 说明：默认设置为 true 时，节点将在pc.wait_prim_timeout指定的时间内等待主要组件。用于启动非主要组件，并使用pc.bootstrap使其成为主要组件。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to ON, TokuDB writes use Direct IO instead of Buffered IO. tokudb_cache_size should be adjusted when using DirectIO.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为ON时，TokuDB使用直接IO而不是缓冲IO进行写入。使用DirectIO时应调整tokudb_cache_size。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to a non-zero value, each replication domain in one master connection can reserve at most that many worker threads at any one time, leaving the rest (up to the value of slave_parallel_threads) free for other master connections or replication domains to use in parallel. See Parallel Replication for details.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为非零值时，一个主连接中的每个复制域一次最多最多可以保留多个工作线程，而其余（最多为slave_parallel_threads的值）可供其他主连接或复制域使用并行使用。有关详细信息，请参见并行复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to a value other than zero ('0'), handlersocket will try to balance accepted connections among threads. Default is 0 but if you use persistent connections (for example if you use client-side connection pooling) then a non-zero value is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当设置为零（“ 0 ”）以外的值时，handlersocket将尝试平衡线程之间可接受的连接。默认值为 0 ,但是如果您使用持久连接（例如，如果使用客户端连接池），则建议使用非零值。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set to the gcomm UUID of a node, that node is evicted from the cluster. When set to an empty string, the eviction list is cleared on the node where it is set. See evs.auto_evict.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置为节点的gcomm UUID时，该节点将从集群中逐出。设置为空字符串时，将在设置驱逐列表的节点上清除驱逐列表。请参阅evs.auto_evict。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set, different master connections in multi-source replication are allowed to receive and process event groups with the same GTID (when using GTID mode). Only one will be applied, any others will be ignored. Within a given replication domain, just the sequence number will be used to decide whether a given GTID has been already applied; this means it is the responsibility of the user to ensure that GTID sequence numbers are strictly increasing. With gtid_ignore_duplicates=OFF, a duplicate event based on domain id and sequence number, will be executed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置后，允许多源复制中的不同主连接接收和处理具有相同GTID的事件组（使用GTID模式时）。仅将应用一个，将忽略其他任何一个。在给定的复制域内，仅序列号将用于确定给定的GTID是否已被应用。这意味着用户有责任确保GTID序列号严格增加。gtid_ignore_duplicates = OFF时，将执行基于域ID和序列号的重复事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set, enables plain-text authentication for the listener for read requests, with the value of the option specifying the secret authentication key.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置后，将为读取请求的侦听器启用纯文本身份验证，该选项的值指定秘密身份验证密钥。

trans-unit.source: Description: When set, enables plain-text authentication for the listener for write requests, with the value of the option specifying the secret authentication key.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置后，为写请求的侦听器启用纯文本身份验证，该选项的值指定秘密身份验证密钥。

trans-unit.source: Description: When the Maria storage engine was renamed Aria, the Maria variables existing at the time were renamed at the same time. See Aria Server Status Variables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当Maria存储引擎重命名为Aria时，当时存在的Maria变量也同时被重命名。请参阅Aria服务器状态变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: When the server starts, this variable is set to the server host name.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器启动时，此变量设置为服务器主机名。

trans-unit.source: Description: When using a UDF function in a condition and the engine_condition_pushdown system variable is set to 1, whether to execute the UDF function locally or push it down.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在条件中使用UDF函数并将 engine_condition_pushdown 系统变量设置为 1 时，是在本地执行UDF函数还是将其下推。

trans-unit.source: Description: When using an index on Spider tables for searching, Spider uses this hint to search the remote table. The remote table index is related to the Spider table index by this hint. The number represented by 000 is the index ID, which is the number of the index shown by the SHOW CREATE TABLE statement. 000 is the Primary Key. For instance, idx000 "force index(PRIMARY)" (in abbreviated format idx000 "f PRIMARY").
trans-unit.target: 说明：在Spider表上使用索引进行搜索时，Spider使用此提示来搜索远程表。通过此提示，远程表索引与Spider表索引相关。 000 表示的数字是索引ID，它是 SHOW CREATE TABLE 语句显示的索引的数字。 000 是主键。例如， idx000 "force index(PRIMARY)" （缩写为 idx000 "f PRIMARY" ）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether binary logging is enabled or not. If the --log-bin option is used, log_bin will be set to ON, otherwise it will be OFF. If no name option is given for --log-bin, datadir/'log-basename'-bin or 'datadir'/mysql-bin will be used (the latter if --log-basename is not specified). We strongly recommend you use either --log-basename or specify a filename to ensure that replication doesn't stop if the real hostname of the computer changes. The name option can optionally include an absolute path. If no path is specified, the log will be written to the data directory. The name can optionally include the file extension; it will be stripped and only the file basename will be used.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否启用二进制日志记录。如果使用--log-bin 选项，则log_bin将设置为ON，否则将为OFF。如果没有为 --log-bin 提供 name 选项，将使用 datadir/'log-basename'-bin 或 'datadir'/mysql-bin （如果未指定--log-basename则使用后者）。强烈建议您使用 --log-basename 或指定文件名，以确保在计算机的真实主机名更改时复制不会停止。名称选项可以选择包含绝对路径。如果未指定路径，则日志将被写入数据目录。该名称可以选择包含文件扩展名。它将被剥离，仅使用文件基本名。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether InnoDB redo log activity should be reduced when natively creating indexes or rebuilding tables. Reduced logging requires additional page flushing and interferes with Mariabackup. Setting this OFF avoids delay due to page flushing and allows concurrent backup.
trans-unit.target: 描述：本地创建索引或重建表时是否应减少InnoDB重做日志活动。减少日志记录需要额外的页面刷新，并且会干扰Mariabackup。设置为OFF可以避免由于页面刷新而造成的延迟，并允许并发备份。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether Spider logs all commands to the General Log. Spider logs error codes according to the spider_log_result_errors system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Spider是否将所有命令记录到常规日志中。Spider根据系统变量 spider_log_result_errors 记录错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether client-server traffic is compressed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：客户端-服务器流量是否被压缩。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether indexes are hot or not. Hot, or online, indexes (the default) mean that the table is available for inserting and updates while the index is being created. It is slower to create hot indexes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：索引是否很热。热索引或在线索引（默认）表示在创建索引时，该表可用于插入和更新。创建热索引的速度较慢。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether libgroonga is embedded or not.
trans-unit.target: 描述： libgroonga是否已嵌入。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether libgroonga supports Zstandard or not.
trans-unit.target: 说明： libgroonga是否支持Zstandard。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether libgroonga supports lz4 or not.
trans-unit.target: 说明： libgroonga是否支持lz4。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether libgroonga supports zlib or not.
trans-unit.target: 说明： libgroonga是否支持zlib。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not InnoDB page compression is enabled by default for new tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：无论InnoDB的页面压缩默认情况下为新表启用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not XtraDB redo log archiving is enabled. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否启用XtraDB重做日志归档。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以便于升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not DML updates for MyISAM tables will be replicated. This functionality is still experimental and should not be relied upon in production systems.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将复制MyISAM表的DML更新。此功能仍处于试验阶段，不应在生产系统中使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not MariaDB is connected to the wsrep provider. Possible values are ON or OFF.
trans-unit.target: 描述： MariaDB是否已连接到wsrep提供程序。可能的值为 ON 或 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not gcache recovery takes place when the node starts up. If it is possible to recover gcache, the node can then provide IST to other joining nodes, which assists when the whole cluster is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 说明：节点启动时是否进行gcache恢复。如果可以恢复gcache，则该节点可以向其他加入的节点提供IST，这有助于重新启动整个集群。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not images of recompressed pages are stored in the InnoDB redo log.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否将重新压缩的页面的图像存储在InnoDB重做日志中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not legacy tables with integer latches are supported.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否支持带有整数锁存器的旧表。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not out-of-order committing is permitted, and under what conditions. By default it is not permitted, but setting this can improve parallel performance.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否允许无序提交以及在什么条件下提交。默认情况下是不允许的，但是设置此项可以提高并行性能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not semisynchronous replication is currently operating on the master. The value will be ON if both the plugin has been enabled and a commit acknowledgment has occurred. It will be OFF if either the plugin has not been enabled, or the master is replicating asynchronously due to a commit acknowledgment timeout.
trans-unit.target: 说明：半同步复制当前是否正在主服务器上运行。如果同时启用了插件并且发生了提交确认，则该值为 ON 。如果尚未启用该插件，或者主服务器由于提交确认超时而异步复制，则它将为 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not semisynchronous replication is currently operating on the slave. ON if both the plugin has been enabled and the slave I/O thread is running.
trans-unit.target: 说明：半同步复制当前是否正在从属服务器上运行。如果同时启用了插件并且从属I / O线程正在运行，则为 ON 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not the Galera wsrep provider is ready. Possible values are ON or OFF
trans-unit.target: 说明： Galera wsrep提供程序是否准备就绪。可能的值为 ON 或 OFF

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not the binary log can be compressed. 0 (the default) means no compression. See Compressing Events to Reduce Size of the Binary Log.
trans-unit.target: 说明：二进制日志是否可以压缩。 0 （默认值）表示不压缩。请参阅压缩事件以减小二进制日志的大小。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not the loaded buffer pool is incomplete, for example after a shutdown or abort during innodb buffer pool load from file caused an incomplete save.
trans-unit.target: 说明：加载的缓冲池是否不完整，例如在关闭或在从文件加载innodb缓冲池期间中止之后导致不完整的保存。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not the prepare phase of an XA transaction performs an fsync().
trans-unit.target: 说明： XA事务的准备阶段是否执行fsync（）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not the rest of the cluster should stay in sync with the donor. If set to YES (NO is default), if the donor is blocked by state transfer, the whole cluster is also blocked.
trans-unit.target: 描述：集群的其余部分是否应与捐助者保持同步。如果设置为 YES （默认为 NO ），则如果施主被状态转移阻止，则整个群集也将被阻止。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not the transaction log is flushed upon transaction commit. Flushing has a minor performance penalty, but switching it off means that committed transactions may not survive a server crash.
trans-unit.target: 描述：事务提交后是否刷新事务日志。刷新对性能的影响不大，但是将其关闭意味着已提交的事务可能无法在服务器崩溃后幸免。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not to use the NUMA interleave memory policy to allocate the InnoDB buffer pool. Before MariaDB 10.2.4, required that MariaDB be compiled on a NUMA-enabled Linux system.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否使用NUMA交错存储策略分配InnoDB缓冲池。在MariaDB 10.2.4之前，要求MariaDB在启用NUMA的Linux系统上编译。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not verbose debugging is enabled. If it is, performance may be adversely impacted
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否启用详细调试。如果是这样，性能可能会受到不利影响

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether or not wsrep replication is enabled. If the global value is set to OFF (the default since MariaDB 10.1), it is not possible to load the provider and join the node in the cluster. If only the session value is set to OFF, the operations from that particular session are not replicated in the cluster, but other sessions and applier threads will continue as normal. The session value of the variable does not affect the node's membership and thus, regardless of its value, the node keeps receiving updates from other nodes in the cluster. Before MariaDB 10.1, even though this variable is ON by default, its value gets automatically adjusted based on whether mandatory configurations to turn on Galera replication have been specified. Since MariaDB 10.1, it is set to OFF by default and must be turned on to enable Galera replication.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否启用wsrep复制。如果全局值设置为 OFF （MariaDB 10.1以来的默认值），则无法加载提供程序并加入集群中的节点。如果仅将会话值设置为 OFF ，则不会在群集中复制该特定会话的操作，但是其他会话和应用程序线程将照常继续。变量的会话值不会影响节点的成员资格，因此，不管其值如何，节点都会不断从群集中的其他节点接收更新。在MariaDB 10.1之前，即使此变量为 ON 默认情况下，它的值会根据是否已指定强制打开Galera复制的配置自动调整。从MariaDB 10.1开始，默认情况下将其设置为 OFF ，并且必须启用它才能启用Galera复制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether recording operations for recovery to the Groonga database is enabled (default) or not. Requires reopening the database with FLUSH TABLES after changing the variable.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否启用了记录到Groonga数据库的记录操作（默认）。更改变量后，需要使用FLUSH TABLES重新打开数据库。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the CONNECT engine should return an exact record number value to information queries. It is OFF by default because this information can take a very long time for large variable record length tables or for remote tables, especially if the remote server is not available. It can be set to ON when exact values are desired, for instance when querying the repartition of rows in a partition table.
trans-unit.target: 说明： CONNECT引擎是否应向信息查询返回准确的记录号值。默认情况下为OFF，因为对于大型可变记录长度表或远程表，此信息可能会花费很长时间，尤其是在远程服务器不可用时。当需要精确值时（例如，查询分区表中的行的重新分区时），可以将其设置为ON。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the server has been built with atomic instructions, provided by the CPU ensuring that critical low-level operations can't be interrupted. XtraDB only.
trans-unit.target: 描述：服务器是否使用CPU提供的原子指令构建，以确保关键的低级操作不会被中断。仅XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the server has the bzip2 compression method available. See InnoDB/XtraDB Page Compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器是否具有可用的bzip2压缩方法。请参阅InnoDB / XtraDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the server has the lz4 compression method available. See InnoDB/XtraDB Page Compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器是否具有可用的lz4压缩方法。请参阅InnoDB / XtraDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the server has the lzma compression method available. See InnoDB/XtraDB Page Compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器是否具有可用的lzma压缩方法。请参阅InnoDB / XtraDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the server has the lzo compression method available. See InnoDB/XtraDB Page Compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器是否具有可用的lzo压缩方法。请参阅InnoDB / XtraDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the server has the snappy compression method available. See InnoDB/XtraDB Page Compression.
trans-unit.target: 说明：服务器是否具有可用的快速压缩方法。请参阅InnoDB / XtraDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the slave is running (both I/O and SQL threads running) or not.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从站是否正在运行（I / O和SQL线程都在运行）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether the transaction should wait for semi-sync acknowledgement after having synced the binlog (AFTER_SYNC), or after having committed in storage engine (AFTER_COMMIT, the default).
