trans-unit.target: 描述：事务在同步二进制日志（ AFTER_SYNC ）之后或在存储引擎中提交之后（ AFTER_COMMIT 为默认值），是否应等待半同步确认。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to allow writes on Spider tables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否允许在Spider表上进行写操作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to assume that the cluster only contains one master.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否假定集群仅包含一个主服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to compute condition push downs.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否计算条件下推。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to convert SELECT... LOCK IN SHARE MODE and SELECT... FOR UPDATE statements into a LOCK TABLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将 SELECT... LOCK IN SHARE MODE 和 SELECT... FOR UPDATE 语句转换为 LOCK TABLE 语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to divide a statement into multiple SQL statements sent to the remote backend server when the optimizer resolves range retrievals to multiple conditions.
trans-unit.target: 描述：当优化程序将范围检索解析为多个条件时，是否将一个语句分成发送到远程后端服务器的多个SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to enable Multi-Threaded Flush operations. For more information, see Fusion.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否启用多线程刷新操作。有关更多信息，请参见Fusion。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to encapsulate FLUSH LOGS and UNLOCK TABLES statements when START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT and FLUSH TABLE WITH READ LOCK statements are sent to the remote backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当将具有 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT 和 FLUSH TABLE WITH READ LOCK 语句发送到远程后端服务器时，是否封装 FLUSH LOGS 和 UNLOCK TABLES 语句。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to force the creation of new connections.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否强制创建新连接。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to ignore quorum calculations, for example when a master splits from several slaves, it will remain in operation if set to true (false is default). Use with care however, as in master-slave setups, slaves will not automatically reconnect to the master if set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否忽略仲裁计算，例如，当主服务器从多个从属服务器拆分时，如果设置为 true （ false is default 值为false），它将保持运行。但是，请谨慎使用，如在主从设置中一样，如果设置了从属，则从属不会自动重新连接到主。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to implement XA at the server- or storage engine-level. When using the server-level, set different values for the server_id system variable on all server instances to generate different xid values.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是在服务器级别还是在存储引擎级别实现XA。使用服务器级别时，请在所有服务器实例上为 server_id 系统变量设置不同的值，以生成不同的 xid 值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to log SQL statements sent to the remote server in the General Query Log. Explicitly setting this system variable to either ON or OFF causes the Spider node to send a SET sql_log_off statement to each of the data nodes using the SUPER privilege.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否在常规查询日志中记录发送到远程服务器的SQL语句。将此系统变量显式设置为 ON 或 OFF 会使Spider 节点使用 SUPER 特权将 SET sql_log_off 语句发送到每个数据节点。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to pass START TRANSACTION WITH SNAPSHOT statements to all connections.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将 START TRANSACTION WITH SNAPSHOT 语句传递给所有连接。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to perform push down operations for OPTIMIZE TABLE statements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否对 OPTIMIZE TABLE 语句执行下推操作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to permit updates to be processed even in the case of split brain (when a node is disconnected from its remaining peers). Safe in master-slave setups, but could lead to data inconsistency in a multi-master setup.
trans-unit.target: 描述：即使在脑裂的情况下（当节点与其其余对等方断开连接时）是否允许处理更新。在主从设置中安全，但是在多主设置中可能导致数据不一致。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to push LOCK TABLES statements down to the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将 LOCK TABLES 语句下推到远程服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to push FLUSH LOGS statements down to remote backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将 FLUSH LOGS 语句下推到远程后端服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to push a local START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT statement down to remote backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将本地 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT 语句下推到远程后端服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to push down local auto-commits to remote backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将本地自动提交下推到远程后端服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to push the local time zone down to remote backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否将本地时区下推到远程后端服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to record pages cached in the buffer pool on server shutdown, which reduces the length of the warmup the next time the server starts. The related innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup specifies whether the buffer pool is automatically warmed up at startup.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否记录服务器关闭时缓存在缓冲池中的页面，这会减少下次服务器启动时的预热时间。相关的innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup指定是否在启动时自动预热缓冲池。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to serialize remote servers connections (use mutex at connecting). Use this parameter if you get an error or slowdown due to too many connection processes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否序列化远程服务器连接（在连接时使用互斥锁）。如果由于连接过程过多而导致错误或速度下降，请使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to skip parallel search by specific conditions.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否按特定条件跳过并行搜索。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to store the result-set in the same temporary table when the temporary table list count for UDF is less than the result-set count on UDF execution.
trans-unit.target: 说明：当UDF的临时表列表计数小于UDF执行时的结果集计数时，是否将结果集存储在同一临时表中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to track changes to the default schema within the current session.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否跟踪当前会话中对默认架构的更改。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to track changes to the session state.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否跟踪对会话状态的更改。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to transmit existence of delay to remote servers when executing an INSERT DELAYED statement on local server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在本地服务器上执行 INSERT DELAYED 语句时是否将延迟的存在传递给远程服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to transmit to remote servers when OPTIMIZE TABLE statements are executed on the local server.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在本地服务器上执行 OPTIMIZE TABLE 语句时是否传输到远程服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to transmit unlock tables to the connection of the table used with SELECT statements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否将解锁表传输到与 SELECT 语句一起使用的表的连接。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to use Push Down index hints, like force_index.
trans-unit.target: 描述：是否使用下推索引提示，例如 force_index 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to use chunk retrieval with offset and limit parameters on SQL statements sent to the remote backend server when using the spider_split_read system variable.
trans-unit.target: 描述：使用 spider_split_read 系统变量时，是否对发送到远程后端服务器的SQL语句使用带偏移量和限制参数的块检索。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to use low memory mode when executing queries issued internally to remote servers that return result-sets.
trans-unit.target: 说明：执行内部发布给返回结果集的远程服务器的查询时，是否使用低内存模式。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to use multiple connections with semi-table locking. To enable semi-table locking, use the spider_semi_table_lock system variable.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否在半表锁定中使用多个连接。要启用半表锁定，请使用 spider_semi_table_lock 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to use the default database.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否使用默认数据库。

trans-unit.source: Description: Whether to use the local table character set for the remote backend server connections.
trans-unit.target: 说明：是否对远程后端服务器连接使用本地表字符集。

trans-unit.source: Description: Which encryption algorithm to use for table encryption. aes_cbc is the recommended one. See Table and Tablespace Encryption.
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于表加密的加密算法。建议使用 aes_cbc 。请参阅表和表空间加密。

trans-unit.source: Description: Windows only, determines whether the server permits shared memory connections. See also shared_memory_base_name.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅Windows，确定服务器是否允许共享内存连接。另请参见shared_memory_base_name。

trans-unit.source: Description: Windows only, specifies the name of the shared memory to use for shared memory connection. Mainly used when running more than one instance on the same physical machine. By default the name is MYSQL and is case sensitive. See also shared_memory.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅Windows，指定用于共享内存连接的共享内存的名称。主要在同一台物理计算机上运行多个实例时使用。默认情况下，名称为 MYSQL ，区分大小写。另请参见shared_memory。

trans-unit.source: Description: Windows-only option that defines the maximum number of milliseconds that the service control manager should wait before trying to kill the Windows service during startup. Defaults to 15000.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅限Windows的选项，用于定义服务控制管理器在尝试在启动过程中终止Windows服务之前应等待的最大毫秒数。默认为 15000 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Windows-only option that has no effect. Kept for compatibility reasons.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅Windows选项无效。出于兼容性原因保留。

trans-unit.source: Description: Windows-only option that installs the mysqld process as a Windows service.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅Windows选项，将 mysqld 进程安装为Windows服务。

trans-unit.source: Description: Windows-only option that keeps the console window open and for writing log messages to stderr and stdout. If specified together with --log-error, the last option will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅Windows选项，可保持控制台窗口打开并用于将日志消息写入stderr和stdout。如果与--log-error一起指定，则最后一个选项优先。

trans-unit.source: Description: Windows-only option that removes the Windows service created by the --install or --install-manual options.
trans-unit.target: 说明：仅Windows选项，删除由 --install 或 --install-manual 选项创建的Windows服务。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write a core-file on crashes. The file name and location are system dependent. On Linux it is usually called core.${PID}, and it is usually written to the data directory. However, this can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：崩溃时编写一个核心文件。文件名和位置取决于系统。在Linux上，通常将其称为 core.${PID} ，并且通常将其写入数据目录。但是，可以更改。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write slowdowns due to L0 being near to full and L0 compaction in progress.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于L0接近满，并且正在进行L0压缩，因此写入速度变慢。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write slowdowns due to L0 being near to full.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于L0接近满，因此写入速度变慢。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write slowdowns due to nearing the limit for the maximum number of pending compaction bytes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于接近未决压缩字节最大数目的限制，写入速度变慢。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write slowdowns due to nearing the maximum number of permitted memtables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于接近允许的内存表的最大数量，因此写入速度变慢。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write stops due to L0 being full and L0 compaction in progress.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于L0已满并且正在进行L0压缩，因此写入停止。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write stops due to L0 being to full.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于L0已满，写入停止。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write stops due to reaching the limit for the maximum number of pending compaction bytes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于达到未决压缩字节最大数目的限制，写入停止。

trans-unit.source: Description: Write stops due to reaching the maximum number of permitted memtables.
trans-unit.target: 说明：由于达到了允许的内存表的最大数量，因此写入停止。

trans-unit.source: Description: WriteOptions::disableWAL for RocksDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明： RocksDB的WriteOptions :: disableWAL。

trans-unit.source: Description: WriteOptions::ignore_missing_column_families for RocksDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明： RocksDB的WriteOptions :: ignore_missing_column_families。

trans-unit.source: Description: Wsrep patch version, for example wsrep_25.10.
trans-unit.target: 说明： Wsrep修补程序版本，例如 wsrep_25.10 。

trans-unit.source: Description: XA Protocol for mirroring and for multi-shard transactions.
trans-unit.target: 描述：用于镜像和多分片事务的XA协议。

trans-unit.source: Description: XtraDB 5.6.13-61 introduced an algorithm to assist with reducing mutex contention when the buffer pool free list is empty, controlled by this variable. If set to backoff, the default, the new algorithm will be used. If set to legacy, the original InnoDB algorithm will be used. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades. See #1651657 for the reasons this was changed back to legacy in XtraDB 5.6.36-82.0.
trans-unit.target: 说明： XtraDB 5.6.13-61引入了一种算法，该算法可在此变量控制的缓冲池空闲列表为空时帮助减少互斥锁争用。如果设置为 backoff ，则默认为新算法。如果设置为 legacy ，则将使用原始的InnoDB算法。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以简化升级。请参阅＃1651657，以将其更改回XtraDB 5.6.36-82.0中的 legacy 的原因。

trans-unit.source: Description: XtraDB has enhanced page cleaner heuristics, and with these in place, the default InnoDB adaptive flushing may be too aggressive. As a result, a new LSN age factor formula has been introduced, controlled by this variable. The default setting, high_checkpoint, uses the new formula, while the alternative, legacy, uses the original algorithm. XtraDB only. Added as a deprecated and ignored option in MariaDB 10.2.6 (which uses InnoDB as default instead of XtraDB) to allow for easier upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 描述： XtraDB增强了页面清理器启发式，并且有了这些，默认的InnoDB自适应刷新可能会过于激进。结果，引入了一个新的LSN年龄因子公式，并由该变量控制。默认设置 high_checkpoint 使用新公式，而替代设置 legacy 使用原始算法。仅XtraDB。在MariaDB 10.2.6（已将InnoDB代替XtraDB作为默认设置）中作为不推荐使用和忽略的选项添加，以便于升级。

trans-unit.source: Description: fsync() operations frequency in milliseconds. If set to 0, the default, tokudb_commit_sync control fsync() behavior.
trans-unit.target: 说明： fsync（）操作频率，以毫秒为单位。如果设置为 0 ，则默认为tokudb_commit_sync控制fsync（）行为。

trans-unit.source: Description: gtid_seq_no can be set on the session level to change which sequence number is logged in the following GTID event. This is used by mysqlbinlog to preserve the sequence number of GTID events.
trans-unit.target: 说明： gtid_seq_no可以在会话级别上设置，以更改在以下GTID事件中记录的序列号。mysqlbinlog使用它来保留GTID事件的序列号。

trans-unit.source: Description: pin_l0_filter_and_index_blocks_in_cache for RocksDB.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用于RocksDB的pin_l0_filter_and_index_blocks_in_cache。

trans-unit.source: Description: zlib compression level (1 gives best speed, 9 gives best compression).
trans-unit.target: 说明： zlib压缩级别（1给出最佳速度，9给出最佳压缩）。
